original: War Score Cost vs Other Religions
Institution Spread In True Faith Provinces
translation: 思潮在正统信仰的省份中传播
每点发展度传教带来的威望

original: Fort Maintenance on border with rival
translation: 与宿敌接壤的要塞维护费
敌方国家建立核心成本

original: Liberty Desire in Same Continent Subjects
translation: 同大洲属国的独立倾向
属国发展度带来的独立倾向

original: Cost of enforcing religion through war
translation: 通过战争强制改变宗教的花费

original: With great effort, torture and a few executions, the rebel problem can be reduced.
translation: 通过努力，使用酷刑和一些处决，反叛问题会收敛一段时间。

original: It will take some time until the rebels in this area have reassembled and can strike again.
translation: 这个区域的叛军想再次集结并发动攻击得花上一段时间。

original: The nobility have been given more power, so they can get more out of their provinces.
translation: 当地贵族被授予了更多的权力，他们对该省的控制增强了。

original: Local provinces have gained power to make their own decisions.
translation: 当地省份获得了部分自治权。

original: When you cannot trust anyone, you send your spies to spy on some of the parliament members.
translation: 你不能相信任何人，你派出间谍监视一些议会成员.

original: Your spies have been sent out to investigate a possible coup against the ruler.
translation: 你的间谍已被送往调查可能发动的政变

original: Some shady people have offered their services to your country.
translation: 有些躲在暗处的人能为您和您的国家提供他们的服务

original: It seems as your Cardinals has begun questioning your ability to lead the Catholic Church. Spies are sent out to investigate the matter.
translation: 看来你的枢机们已经开始质疑你领导天主教会的能力。间谍已被派出调查此事。

original: The reduced war expenditures are increasing the strain of war on our country.
translation: 减少的战争支出使我国前线战事吃紧。

original: The lucrative trade has given us the opportunity to invest in merchants and that opportunity was grasped immediately.
translation: 利润丰厚的贸易让我们有机会投资商业并抓住机会

original: Our merchants have started new shipping and trade ventures on the high seas.
translation: 我们的商人在公海开始了新的航运和贸易活动。

original: Thanks to our shrewd commerce practices, merchants are being attracted to our realm and our trade efficiency has increased as a result.
translation: 我们精明的商业条例将商人吸引到了我们的土地上，这是我们贸易效率提高的结果

original: Our realm's diplomatic standing benefits from the competence of our ruler.
translation: 由于我们统治者熟练的外交能力，我国的外交地位提升了。

original: Our realm's diplomatic standing suffers due to the incompetence of our ruler.
translation: 由于我们统治者糟糕透顶的外交手段，我国的外交地位下降。

original: Our non-involvement is a boon to the province, which is slowly developing into a hub for the local economy.
translation: 我们对省份的不管不顾是它们的福音，这里慢慢成为了经济的枢纽

original: The developing economy of this province has made the work of our tax collectors easier.
translation: 省份经济的发展使收税更加容易了

original: As this province continues to grow, recruiters from our army are having an easier time finding promising candidates.
translation: 由于省份持续增长，招募部队变得更加容易

original: Land seized from the nobility has been given to the army to bolster and centralize power.
translation: 没收贵族土地并收回权利

original: Reforms focused on advancements in trade and naval technology.
translation: 改革的重点在贸易和海军技术的进步.

original: Turning a recent sacking of Moscow into an opportunity has resulted in the crushing of the local opposition.
translation: 最近对莫斯科的清理让我们有机会消灭当地反对派

original: Abolishing of the old Kormlenije-system, where salaries for provincial administration were paid directly from the hands of the peasants, have greatly increased financial efficiency.
translation: 取消的老的系统，省级行政工资直接由农民支付，极大地提高金融效率.

original: Creating a separate Chamber of Finance has greatly increased the efficiency of in- and outflow of cash.
translation: 创建一个单独的金融商会使现金流动的效率大大提高.

original: Enserfing the peasants and restricting their rights to move around has increased our efficiency to draft manpower for our armed forces.
translation: 奴役农民并限制他们走动的权利，这加快了组织军队的效率

original: Serfdom has now been legally defined a recently passed law.
translation: 最近通过的法律中已经通过了农奴制法律

original: The refusal to legalize serfdom has severely hurt the economy.
translation: 农奴制合法化遭到拒绝，严重伤害经济.

original: In order to stabilize the country and reduce the risk of open rebellion, the provinces have been given more autonomy.
translation: 为了稳定该国局势，并降低风险公开叛乱，各省被赋予了更多的自主权.

original: Medieval and obsolescent forms of government have been abolished in favor of new centralized state organs to improve governmental efficiency.
translation: 中世纪过时的政府形式已经被废除，新的中央政府成立以提高政府效率.

original: The obligation to heed the advice of any council has been abolished.
translation: 听取议会意见的义务已被废止。

original: The Orthodox Church has been fully subjugated to the state.
translation: 东正教已经完全屈服于国家

original: A new constitution based on the influence of all social classes.
translation: 新宪法的制定过程中受到了各种各样社会阶层的影响。

original: An influential aristocracy bent to preserve their growing monopoly has steered our trade policy towards mercantilism.
translation: 一个有影响力的贵族铁了心要保持其不断增长的垄断，这使得我们走向重商主义

original: We have instituted reforms to move our country from a mercantilist policy towards free trade.
translation: 我们已经制定了改革，使我们的国家走向自由贸易的道路

original: The system of serfdom has been tightened to the point where there is scarcely a free peasant left in the country.
translation: 农奴制紧紧的将农民锁在了自己的土地上。

original: The system of serfdom has been reformed to loosen the grip of the peasants.
translation: 农奴制改革增强了农民的积极性。

original: Serfdom has been restricted as a step towards abolishing these shackles imposed on the peasants.
translation: 农奴制得以受限，代表着打破农奴枷锁的那一天更近了.

original: The shackles of serfdom have finally been removed.
translation: 农奴的束缚终于被解开了

original: Reforms to transform the country into a fully westernized state.
translation: 各类改革让全国彻底变成了西化国家

original: Uprisings and protests have led to the retraction of a number of recent reforms.
translation: 一些起义和游行迫使政府撤销了一部分改革内容.

original: Trips around Europe to study governmental institutions have benefited our own government reforms.
translation: 游学欧洲政府机关建设有利于我国自己的政府改革.

original: Trips around Europe to study military institutions have benefited our own military reforms.
translation: 游学欧洲军队建设有利于我国自己的军事改良.

original: Trips around Europe to study naval institutions have benefited our own naval reforms.
translation: 游学欧洲海军建设有利于我国自己的海军改良.

original: The mental illness of the ruler has among other things affected his chance of producing an heir.
translation: 统治者的精神疾病降低了他产生后嗣的几率.

original: We are facing serious problems with our trade. Revenue is being hurt because of this.
translation: 我们的贸易现在面临着严重的问题. 我们的收入会因此受到影响的.

original: We are facing problems with our trade. Revenue is being hurt because of this and we are also finding it more difficult to expand our trade.
translation: 我们的贸易正面临着问题. 由于很难扩展贸易所以财政收入受到了影响.

original: Several years of poor harvests have caused a severe and widespread famine.
translation: 连续多年的歉收使得严重的饥荒蔓延全国.

original: Several years of poor harvests have caused a famine.
translation: 连续多年的歉收导致了一段饥荒.

original: A vast amount of resources are spent fighting the famine that has spread across the country.
translation: 国家动用了大量资源来对抗蔓延全国的饥荒.

original: A severe outbreak of plague has followed in the wake of several years of poor harvests.
translation: 紧随多年的歉收，一场严峻的瘟疫爆发了.

original: The outbreak of plague has been contained to only a few areas.
translation: 瘟疫被有效控制在少数地区

original: A severe outbreak of plague has followed in the wake of several years of poor harvests.
translation: 紧随多年的歉收，一场严峻的瘟疫爆发了.

original: The outbreak of plague has been contained to only a few areas.
translation: 瘟疫被有效控制在少数地区

original: With the breakdown of local authorities, armed brigands are roaming the countryside, terrorizing the population.
translation: 随着公共秩序失衡，乡间出现武装暴徒不断袭击民众，破坏农村建设.

original: Usurping the throne has caused a lot of protests among the population as well as in the bureaucracy.
translation: 宫廷内外，篡夺王位的行为导致了大量的抗议.

original: The capital is under control by religious fanatics who have fortified it heavily.
translation: 首都遭到宗教狂热分子控制，并已被加强布防.

original: Religious violence has ravaged the province.
translation: 宗教暴力对该省份造成了破坏.

original: Religious massacres have severely ravaged the province.
translation: 宗教清洗对该省份造成了严重破坏.

original: In the Wars of Religion we have chosen to back the heretic minority.
translation: 在这场宗教战争中，我们选择支持异端少数派

original: In the Wars of Religion we have chosen to back the Catholics.
translation: 在这场宗教战争中，我们被选派为支持天主教徒.

original: In the Wars of Religion we have chosen to back the Protestants.
translation: 在这场宗教战争中，我们被选派为支持新教教徒.
通过商会联盟提出要求

original: Did Not Form Chambers of Union
The establishment of higher direct taxes on land has led to increased tension.
translation: 直接税的建立使局势变得紧张.

original: The Nobility has been granted more influence over politics and finance as well as tax reductions.
translation: 贵族在政治、经济和减税方面得到更多影响力.

original: Entrusted with the official authority of the French language and the promotion of literary pursuits.
translation: 以官方的法语权威进行教育并提升人民的文学造诣

original: State-guided economic reforms including better tax collection, statistical planning of the budget and regular bookkeeping.
translation: 政府宏观经济包含了更好的税务监督，更精确的财政预算和统计。

original: Mercantile reforms aimed at a favorable French balance of trade, high import tariffs and the establishment of state monopolies and subsidized manufactures.
translation: 商业改革着重体现为法国的贸易顺差、高进口关税、建立国家商业垄断机制并鼓励再生产。

original: Naval reforms to promote navigation, trade associations and a greatly enlarged royal navy.
translation: 海军改革包含提升航海技能、配合贸易需要并扩大皇家海军规模。

original: The construction of a royal palace of unprecedented magnificence.
translation: 这座前所未有的壮丽皇家宫殿的建设.

original: A royal palace of unprecedented magnificence.
translation: 一座前所未有的壮丽皇家宫殿

original: The old tax of a tenth that many were exempt from has been replaced by a new tax for everyone.
translation: 人人交税的新税收制度替换了以前十一税老制度.
含有免税特例的二十一税

original: The old tax of a tenth that many were exempt from has been replaced by a new tax for everyone, but exemptions are still made.
translation: 人人交税的新税收制度替换了以前十分之一人口免税的老制度，但是免税的特例依旧存在

original: A series of harsh economic reforms.
translation: 一系列严酷的经济改革

original: Economic reforms to bring down the national debt.
translation: 旨在减少国债的各类经济改革

original: Severe reforms to address the internal problems.
translation: 力图解决国内问题的严峻改革

original: Reforms to address the social injustices.
translation: 旨在解决社会不公平现象的改革

original: The effect of the mass executions of the 'enemies of the revolution.'
translation: 大规模处死“反革命分子”的影响

original: By uniting the Leopoldian and Albertinian lines of the house of Habsburg we will once again assert our influence over European politics and secure our place as the most prestigious member of the Holy Roman Empire.
translation: 通过联合哈布斯堡家族中的利奥波德和阿尔贝蒂尼血统，我们会再一次以神圣罗马帝国中最德高望重的成员的身份来稳固权力地位并影响欧洲政治走向.

original: Mercantilist trade reforms to break the stranglehold of the western merchants on the Black Sea trade.
translation: 重商主义旨在通过改革来破坏西方商人在黑海贸易中的垄断地位。

original: Army reforms to match any potential threat and ensure further expansion.
translation: 陆军的改革旨在对抗任何可能的军事威胁并为进一步扩张做准备.

original: Army and Navy reforms to match any potential threat and ensure further expansion.
translation: 陆军和海军的改革旨在对抗任何可能的军事威胁并为进一步扩张做准备.

original: Navy reforms to match any potential threat and ensure further expansion.
translation: 海军的改革旨在对抗任何可能的军事威胁并为进一步扩张做准备.

original: Training promising devsirmes and sons of prominent Ottoman officials in literature, theology, engineering and mathematics, preparing them for government service as civil servants and janissaries.
translation: 在文学、神学、工程学和数学方面训练皈依者和有突出贡献的奥斯曼官员的子嗣，为他们在政府部门和奥斯曼禁卫军中的服役做准备.

original: The system with landed Timariot Sipahis supplying the bulk of the Ottoman cavalry has been expanded.
translation: 西帕希贵族军队系统大幅增强了奥斯曼帝国的骑兵力量

original: The power of the provinces has been suppressed in order to strengthen the central government.
translation: 各省份权力被弱化，以增强中央集权.

original: A focused effort in order to meet the danger of the ever-increasing Christian navies.
translation: 集中力量发展，旨在对抗日趋强大的基督教海军.

original: Mimar Sinan planned and oversaw the construction of countless mosques, aqueducts, bathhouses, bridges, palaces, caravanserais and schools during his half-a-century long career.
translation: 在他持续半个世纪的任期中，米马尔·希南规划并监督了无数清真寺、沟渠，浴池，宫殿，驿站和学校的建设.

original: Kösem Sultan ruled her husband with an iron grip. She was a very able ruler, but not a very popular one.
translation: 柯塞姆苏丹用铁腕手段管理着他的丈夫，她是一位很能干的领导者，但不是一位受人民爱戴的.

original: Grand Vizier Mehmed Köprülü was an excellent and honest administrator and fierce fighter of corruption. His descendants would continue as Grand Viziers after his death.
translation: 首相科普拉鲁曾是一位优秀、诚实的管理者和积极的反腐战士.即便他去世了，他的后代也会接替他首相的事业.

original: The reforms of 'Kemankes' Kara Mustafa Pasha aimed to curtail overspending and revitalize the navy.
translation: 卡拉·穆斯塔法帕夏的改革“科曼克斯”旨在减少支出，复兴海军.

original: The local provincial governor, the 'Bey', has been given extensive autonomy.
translation: 当地省分最高长官被给予广泛的自治权

original: The local provincial governor, the 'Bey', has been given almost complete autonomy.
translation: 当地省分最高长官被给予极高的自治权

original: Our refusal to extend his authority has upset the local Bey.
translation: 拒绝给赋予他权力，使该省省长心情沮丧.

original: Attempts to limit the local soldiers' excessive extortion of the population have caused widespread mutiny.
translation: 限制当地士兵勒索群众导致了大规模兵变

original: The local Bey is known for withholding taxes that should be sent on to the central government.
translation: 该省省长因私自扣押应上缴中央的税款而出名.

original: Having denied the Janissaries their customary rewards has greatly upset them.
translation: 耶尼切里没有得到应得的奖赏，这使得他们情绪很沮丧.

original: Having denied the Janissaries the right to marry has greatly upset them.
translation: 耶尼切里被禁止结婚后，这使得他们情绪很沮丧.
耶尼切里新兵数量增加

original: We have refused to make inroads into the independent traditions of the guilds. As a result the reach of our law is limited here but we do have their gratitude.
translation: 我们已经拒绝对行会独立传统的侵害.因而我们的法律在这里受到限制,但他们对我们十分感激.

original: The [Root.GetAreaName] Area has seen a marked increase in local social unrest coupled with a rise in popular Sufism. As our state has been unwilling to entertain the Sufi leaders themselves we have been unable to calm the sitaution.
translation: [Root.GetAreaName]地区的叛乱有着显著地上升,伴随着一个高人气的苏菲的崛起.由于我们的国家一直不愿意接待苏菲,我们已经无法平息事态.

original: Local dissidents have used the coffee houses of [Root.GetAreaName] as a central meeting point to plan social obstruction and even open rebellion.
translation: [Root.GetAreaName]的本地异见者长久以来使用咖啡馆作为集中会议点来计划干扰社会甚至公开叛乱.

original: The quick establishment of Sufi orders in this province has strengthened of state authority in this new province.
translation: 这个省份的快速建立的苏菲秩序,已经强化了国家在这个省份内的权威.

original: We have strengthened government institutions in this province to help integrate it more quickly in our legal framework.
translation: 我们已经强化了这个省份的政府机构来帮助它更快的并入我们的法律框架.

original: Janissaries have been allowed to become landholders.
translation: 耶尼切里被允许拥有土地
奥斯曼耶尼切里的沮丧

original: Having denied the Janissaries to hold land has greatly upset them.
translation: 耶尼切里被禁止拥有土地，这使得他们情绪很沮丧.

original: The Janissaries were the elite infantry of the Ottoman Empire, a highly disciplined and well-trained standing force.
translation: 奥斯曼耶尼切里是帝国的精锐常备部队。他们装备精良且军纪严明。

original: Discontent with what their lack of direct influence over the government, the Janissary Corps have revolted against their sovreign and taken control over the state.
translation: 对他们缺少对政府的直接影响表示不满，耶尼切里军团已经起兵对抗他们的君主并控制了国家。
提高耶尼切里军团薪水

original: Using their great leverage over the government the Janissaries have seen fit to increase their salaries.
translation: 使用他们在政府内的权势，耶尼切里认为应提高他们的薪水。

original: We have done all we can to enforce all rules as strictly as possible for the Janissaries under our control.
translation: 我们已经尽我们所能执行所有严苛的条例，来让耶尼切里归于我们掌控。
招募更多穆斯林耶尼切里

original: A growing number of Janissaries are being recruited not through the Devshirme but from the Muslim families of the Empire.
translation: 大量耶尼切里士兵并没有招募自德芙什美系统,而是来自帝国内的许多穆斯林家庭.

original: Contrary to Shiite custom we have allowed Friday prayers in our country to create greater cohesion within our community.
translation: 与什叶派的传统相反,我们允许国内在星期五礼拜,以此在我们的社区内创造更大的凝聚力.

original: Many among the Ulema are at odds with the current policies of our state. Rather than support such an enterprise they have are leaving our country, robbing us of many men of learning.
translation: 许多乌理玛都与我们国家当前的政策不相容.比起支持这样的事业,他们选择离开我们的国家,顺带劫走了许多有才之人.
强迫耶尼切里遵守军纪

original: We are enforcing strict discipline among the janissaries as well as paying them salaries that are up to date with inflation.
translation: 我们已经对耶尼切里强制实行严厉的纪律。同时支付了他们依据现今通胀计算的薪水。

original: §Y20%§! or above of the [Root.GetAdjective] Army consists of Janissary Regiments.
translation: §Y20%§! 或更多的[Root.GetAdjective]的军队是耶尼切里军团.

original: Prussia tries to duplicate the success of the Dutch Veerinigte Oostindische Companie.
translation: 普鲁士想要复制荷兰东印度公司所取得的成功.

original: Prussia has embraced the New Ideals of the Age of Enlightenment - religious freedom, education, freedom of speech and political opinion.
translation: 普鲁士拥抱了启蒙时代的新理念————宗教、言论的自由、教育普及和政治观点.

original: Prussia has embraced the Reforms of Reaction.
translation: 普鲁士拥抱了复古改革

original: As the building of a castle on the island of Spree stopped, the unrest slowly abated.
translation: 当斯普雷河上的城堡停止建造后，暴动慢慢得到平息.

original: Brandenburg started selling indulgences to clear Joachim I Nestor's younger brother, the Archbishop-Elector Albert of Mainz, of his debts.
translation: 勃兰登堡开始出售用来洗涤美茵茨大主教约阿希姆一世？涅斯托尔的罪恶的赎罪卷，

original: John George, Elector of Brandenburg, instituted a grain tax to clear the debts accumulated during the reign of his father which drove the peasants into rebellion.
translation: 勃兰登堡的总督候选人约翰·乔治，设立了一项粮食税，用来还抵早年他父亲统治时期导致农民暴动的长期债务.

original: Erasmus Reinhold produced ephemeris or astronomical tables in 1551 with the financial support of Albert I, Duke of Prussia.
translation: 在普鲁士伯爵阿尔伯特一世的经济支持下，伊拉兹马斯·莱因霍尔德在1551年制出了星历表或叫天文表，

original: The Nieszawa Privileges required the King to seek the lords' approval when issuing new laws, when levying the mobilization of armed forces, or when imposing new taxes.
translation: 涅沙瓦特权要求国王在颁布新法律、动员武装部队或设立新税务前征求贵族们的同意，

original: The Statute of Piotrkow implies that serfdom is strengthened and accepted in law.
translation: 彼得库夫法规表明农奴制得到了加强并正式被法律承认。

original: Freedom of religion and the ideological principle of religious tolerance are the foundation of Polish society.
For Sigismund III, religion was as important to him as politics. His great obsession was to make Catholicism the State-religion of Poland.
translation: 对于西格斯蒙德三世来说，宗教和政治同样重要.他的一大愿望就是让天主教变成波兰国教.

original: Henri d'Anjou signed the Pacta Conventa, which was a formal contract between the elected monarch and the Sejm. The monarch lost all power over his country and had to beg the Sejm to authorize any new policies or laws.
translation: 亨利·德·安茹签署契约协定，一份民选君主和议会之间的协定.君王失去了对国家的所有权力，必须请求议院才能批准新的政策和法律

original: Commemorating the great king Sigismund III Vasa, a column was built and placed in Warszawa, on which a sculpture of the king is placed.
translation: 为了纪念伟大的西格斯蒙德三世国王，在华沙一处国王的雕塑之上，建造了一座纪念柱.

original: Merkuriusz Polski Ordynaryjny is a Polish newspaper devoted to contemporary politics, European dynastic affairs, and monarchs' military campaigns.
translation: 《波兰的每日精神》是一种致力于报道波兰即时政治、欧洲王室事件和君王军事战役的波兰报纸.

original: The Sejm is refusing to provide troops to our monarch's activities.
translation: 波兰国会拒绝为了我们君主的行动而供给军队。

original: The Sejm has vetoed the monarch's policies
translation: 议会否决了君王的新政策

original: The Sejm has complied with the monarch's policies
translation: 议会表决同意了君王的新政策

original: China is closed to the outside world
Holland has expanded the loan market.
Holland has issued strict control over the loan market
translation: 荷兰开展了对房贷市场的严格监管

original: Has a trade node in Jamaica
Franciscus Gomarus opposes the beliefs of Jacobus Arminius who taught Pelagian doctrines and tried to create a new school of theology within the university where the two of them taught.
translation: 弗朗西斯·戈马尔反对传播贝拉基主义的雅各·阿米纽斯，阿米纽斯试图在他们所在大学中建立新的神学学院.

original: Arminianism is based on the theological ideas of the Dutch Reformed theologian Jacobus Arminius.
translation: 阿米纽派是根据荷兰神学改革者雅各·阿米纽斯所提出的神学思想为基础的派别.

original: Jan De Witt was a key figure in Dutch politics in the mid 17th century, controlling the political system of the Netherlands.
translation: 雅安·德·维特是18世纪中叶荷兰政治中的重要组成人物，他控制着荷兰的整个政治系统.

original: Anthony Heinsius was a Dutch statesman who served as Grand Pensionary of Holland.
translation: 安东尼·海因斯乌斯曾是荷兰政要，职务为荷兰地区秘书长（行政长官）

original: The Polish nobles have formed a Konfederacja. Their semi-legal rebellion, rokosz, is a protest against the king's desire to limit the power of the nobles and introduce a hereditary monarchy.
translation: 波兰贵族组成联邦，并开展以议会支持的半合法叛乱，力图对抗西格斯蒙德三世想要削弱贵族、建立君主世袭制的企图.

original: The Bible has been translated into Dutch, commissioned by the States-General of the Netherlands.
translation: 由荷兰议会同意后，圣经被翻译成荷兰语.

original: William of Orange is the main character of this popular and remarkably peaceful song.
translation: 奥兰治的威廉国王是这首非常柔和并广泛流行于民间的歌曲中的主要人物.

original: The Advisors of Abbas the Great
The two Englishmen Anthony and Robert Sherley are the new advisors of Abbas the Great.
translation: 阿巴斯大帝有两个英国顾问，安东尼和罗伯特.

original: The Dodda Ganeshana Gudi is dedicated to Nandi, the sacred bull and close devotee and attendant of Shiva.
translation: 牛神庙专注于对南迪的供奉，它是湿婆的随从、亲近的信徒和神圣的公牛.

original: The temple is dedicated to the deity Veerabhadra and a great granite Nandi bull carved from a single stone is the centerpiece of the temple.
translation: 这个神殿供奉勇者吉祥尊，大殿的中央是以单独一块花岗岩所刻而成的公牛南迪.

original: The eight Telugu poets patronized by the emperor Sri Krishna Deva Raya of Vijayanagara are called Astadiggajas and the era is called The Prabandha Age.
translation: 八个受到毗阇耶那伽罗王朝的斯里·克里希纳·德瓦·拉亚宠幸的泰卢古诗人被称为诗坛八象，这个时代被叫做普拉班达时代。

original: The temple was constructed by King Prasat Thong in memory of his mother and the name of the temple means 'Temple of long reign and glorious era'.
translation: 巴萨通王为了缅怀他的母亲才建立了这座寺庙，寺庙的名字的本意为“记录昌盛繁荣年代的神殿”.

original: A temple has been built around one of the Buddha's footprints.
translation: 这座寺庙建立在佛祖走过的路途上.

original: King Boromma Trailokanat of Ayutthaya ordered the construction of the Wat Ratchaburana temple, with a chedi said to enshrine relics of the Buddha.
translation: 阿瑜陀耶国王波隆摩·戴莱洛迦纳命令建造一座供奉佛祖的寺庙，并有一尊佛塔用以保存佛祖的神迹。

original: John Knox spreads religious strife in Scotland, preaching Protestantism.
translation: 约翰·诺克斯在苏格兰散布宗教冲突，宣扬新教.

original: The practice of witchcraft and consulting with witches have become capital offenses.
translation: 巫术实践以及与巫师的交流已经成为了一项经常性的活动

original: The Sengoku Jidai, or Warring States Period, has begun.
Japanese pirates called Wokou raid the coasts of Korea and Ming.
translation: 在朝鲜和大明沿海烧杀掳掠的日本海盗被称为倭寇。

original: No foreigner can enter nor can any Japanese leave the country on penalty of death. That is the Sakoku law.
translation: 外国人不得进入，日本人不得离开，违令者死.那就是锁国令.

original: The Sakoku law, which decrees that no foreigner can enter nor can any Japanese leave the country on penalty of death, is being questioned
translation: 锁国令——禁止外国人进入以及日本人离开，违者将被处死的法令——被质疑了

original: Dutch traders in Dejima spread Western knowledge throughout Japan.
translation: 出岛的荷兰商人将西方的知识传遍了日本

original: Japan has closed its borders to foreign traders and missionaries.
translation: 日本关闭了口岸禁止外国商人和传教士进入

original: The seamen of the ship Liefde have been taken care of by a benevolent daimyo.
translation: 慈爱号的船员受到了一位仁慈的大名的关照

original: Kabuki theater and Uk Ukiyo-e, woodblock prints or woodcuts and paintings, flourish.
translation: 歌舞伎剧院、浮世绘、版画、木雕以及绘画蓬勃发展

original: The arquebus, a matchlock gun, has been introduced to Japan.
translation: 火绳枪——一种使用火绳点火的枪械——被引入了日本

original: Merchant guilds, or Za, protect the merchants against bandits, samurai and daimyos.
translation: 商人行会——也称为“座”——保护商人不受强盗、武士以及大名的迫害

original: Higashiyama culture is based on the ideals and aesthetics of Zen Buddhism and the concept of wabi-sabi, beauty in simplicity.
translation: 东山文化基于佛教禅宗的理念以及侘寂简约的美学观

original: Sekisho or 'barriers' are checkpoints that control the movement of people and certain goods.
translation: 关所是用来控制人或特定商品流通的据点

original: 'The Various Points of Laws for Warrior Houses' or Buke Shohatto is a code of conduct, how to behave as an honorable daimyo.
translation: 《武家诸法度》是一部规定如何成为一名令人尊敬的大名的行为准则

original: The Five Routes have been constructed in Japan, with post stations set up along the route where travelers can rest and buy supplies.
translation: 五街道已经在日本建立起来了，沿着五街道设立的邮站可供路人休憩或购买补给.

original: Educational institutions for commoners are called Terakoya.
translation: 平民百姓的教育设施被称作寺子屋

original: The Golden Age of the Edo period has created economic stability and arts and architecture flourish.
translation: 江户时期的黄金时代造就了经济稳定有序，艺术与农业一片繁荣的的景象

original: The scholars who research the early Japanese classics and criticize the repressive moralizing of Confucian thinkers call their study Kokugaku or 'National Study'.
translation: 那些研究日本早期经典学说并批评儒教思想家强制性道德说教的学者称他们的研究为古学，或“日本国学”

original: Daimyos now have to move periodically between Edo and their han, while their wives and heirs remain in Edo as hostages.
translation: 现在大名们需要定期地往返于江户和他们自己的藩（执行政务），而他们的妻儿则长期居留在江户作为人质.

original: The Kyoho Reforms were aimed at making the shogunate financially solvent and were an array of economic policies. These policies have been reworked to fit a trade reform instead.
translation: 享保改革旨在解决幕府的财政负债问题，可以说是经济政策的指向标。这些政策被重新修订以适用于贸易改革。

original: The Kyoho Reforms were aimed at making the shogunate financially solvent and were an array of economic policies. These policies have been reworked to fit a military reform instead.
translation: 享保改革旨在解决幕府的财政负债问题，可以说是经济政策的指向标。这些政策被重新修订以适用于军事改革。

original: The Kyoho Reforms are aimed at making the shogunate financially solvent and were an array of economic policies.
translation: 享保改革旨在解决幕府的财政负债问题，可以说是经济政策的指向标。

original: The first sake, fermented rice wine, has been sold.
translation: 第一批清酒（用大米酿造的酒）卖出了

original: We have decided to call up extra recruits for our war.
translation: 我们决定为了我们的战争募集更多的新兵

original: We have spread rumors about another daimyo, which is generally frowned upon.
translation: 你散布了关于另一位大名的谣言，这实在令人难以接受

original: Holland has become a competitor to the Hansa and thus the Hansa has stopped spreading its shipbuilding technology.
translation: 荷兰已经成为汉萨的竞争者，因此汉萨停止了其造船技术的传播

original: Hansa has agreed to spread its shipbuilding technology even though Holland has become its competitor.
translation: 尽管荷兰成了汉萨的竞争者，但汉萨仍然同意了继续传播其造船技术

original: We have instituted trade reforms to increase our trade.
translation: 我们实行了贸易改革来增加我们的贸易

original: The economic reforms instituted will resolve our issues with our economy.
translation: 颁布实施的经济改革可以解决目前我们遇到的经济问题

original: The military reforms we have instituted will make our military the best in the world.
translation: 我们实施的军事改革可以使我们的军队成为世界一流军队

original: The Consulate of the Sea is a new quasi-judicial body that will administer maritime and commercial law.
translation: 海洋理事会是管理海事和商业法律的是一个新的准司法机构

original: Book of the Consulate of the Sea

The Book of the Consulate of the Sea will contain a code of procedure for the guidance of the courts of the consuls of the sea, a collection of ancient customs of the sea, and a body of rules for the government of cruisers of war.
translation: 海洋法典包含了海上船员应该遵循的法律指导，走船的古老习俗和海军战争的主要规定

original: Monastery of Santa María de Sigena
While we fund the Monastery of Santa María de Sigena, the convent will thrive.
translation: 当我们资助了圣玛利亚修道院后，修道院开始成长

original: The artist of the Monastery of Santa María de Sigena
translation: 圣玛利亚修道院艺术家

original: The Maestro de Sigena is currently painting a large altarpiece for the Monastery of Santa María de Sigena.
translation: 圣玛利亚修道院的艺术大师们创作了一幅大型画作

original: The Sindicat Remença is a peasants' guild or primitive trade union.
translation: 农民辛迪加是农民公会和早期贸易联盟

original: The Bohus Fortress has been fortified.
Designed by Donato Bramante, Michelangelo, Carlo Maderno and Gian Lorenzo Bernini, St. Peter's is one of the largest and most beautiful churches in the world.
translation: 圣伯多禄大殿由多纳托·伯拉孟特、米开朗基罗、卡洛·马代尔诺以及济安·劳伦佐·贝尼尼共同设计建造，是世界最大最美丽的教堂.

original: The Pope has reorganized the Roman inquisition according to the Spanish model.
translation: 教宗根据西班牙的模式重组了罗马宗教法庭

original: The Pope has reorganized the Roman inquisition.
translation: 教宗重组了罗马宗教法庭

original: The heretic Giordano Bruno was arrested in Venezia and extradited to Rome, where he was put on trial and condemned to be burned at the stake.
translation: 异教徒焦尔达诺·布鲁诺在威尼斯被逮捕了，之后被引渡到罗马，经过审判之后被烧死在火刑柱上.

original: The religious order and its members, the Society of Jesus, are allowed to stay in Manchu.
translation: 耶稣会的宗教团体以及成员被允许留在满洲

original: Rhodians and Greeks have been allowed into the order of the Knights of St. John.
translation: 罗德人和希腊人被允许加入圣若翰骑士团

original: Captured the Great Carrack of Alexandria
translation: 俘获亚历山大的大帆船
加布里埃尔·塔蒂尼·德·马丁讷戈

original: The best fortification engineer of Europe, Gabriele Tadino da Martinengo, has joined the Knights of St. John.
translation: 欧洲最伟大的要塞工程师——加布里埃尔·塔蒂尼·德·马丁讷戈加入了圣若翰骑士团

original: The fortress in Malta has become as strong as Rhodes is, and under Grand Master Jean Parisot de La Valette's command it will be able to withstand any attack.
translation: 马耳他的要塞已经变得和罗得的一样牢固了，在大教长让·帕里索·德·拉·瓦莱特的领导下能够抵御一切攻击

original: Refused to send help in our time of need
translation: 拒绝在需要的时候提供帮助

original: A new 'religion' called football has crazed the population.
translation: 一种新的叫做足球的「宗教」让人们为之疯狂。
你的祖先一直关注着你……

original: Due to an 'inside man', your fort has a lowered defense!
translation: 由于一名“内应”的破坏，你要塞的防御降低了！

original: An inside man is very valuable during wars.
translation: 在战争期间内应是很有用的

original: Askia the Great opened religious schools and astronomical observatories. He encouraged trade and established an efficiency bureaucracy.
translation: 阿斯基亚大帝建立了宗教学校和天文观测台。他鼓励贸易并建立了一个高效的官僚体系。

original: A pious ruler will surely be rewarded in the afterlife.
translation: 虔诚的统治者来世一定会得到回报的。

original: Archery will serve a primary role in your armies.
translation: 弓箭手在你的军队里扮演着极其重要的角色。

original: A privateer has managed to get essential supplies through the blockades to your country, demanding hefty sums for his help.
translation: 一名私掠者设法突破封锁为你的国家带来了必需补给品，他要求获得巨额的补助。

original: Merchants and the Gap in the Blockade
The merchants grumble but obligingly pay the hefty sums demanded by a privateer who managed to get essential supplies through the blockades to your country.
translation: 商人一边抱怨一边乖乖的将一大笔钱付给了一名设法突破封锁将必需品带到你国家的私掠者。

original: Roman fever has struck your colony, but an energetic leader has managed to reduce the devastating force of the illness.
translation: 罗马热症袭击了你的殖民地，但是一名富有活力的领导设法将疾病的毁灭性力量降低了。

original: The colony has been quarantined to stop the spreading of Roman Fever.
translation: 为了阻止罗马热症的传播，殖民地已经被隔离起来了。

original: The devastating illness Roman Fever has struck the colony and more and more colonists fall victim to the disease and die.
translation: 毁灭性的的疾病罗马热症袭击了殖民地，越来越多的殖民者得病死了。

original: Jesuits have established a mission in your colony to Christianize the natives there.
translation: 耶稣会在你的殖民地建立了一个传教团以使那里的当地人基督教化。

original: The greedy Janissaries demand that the State recompense them for the recent lack of booty.
translation: 贪婪的禁军要求国家为他们最近的物资缺乏做出补偿。

original: The King's Musketeers are open to the lower nobility and provide them with an opportunity to prove their military skill and loyalty to the crown.
translation: 由下级贵族组成的国王火枪手卫队，这些贵族以此证明他们军事实力以及对国王忠诚度。

original: The peasants are creating havoc over us trying to modernize and make our nation a civilized one.
translation: 农民们正在制造恐慌阻挠我们进行西化。

original: The peasants are not pleased with the new heir, the child you found in the reeds and adopted.
translation: 农民们对新的继承者并不满意，就是那个你在芦苇丛中发现并收养的孩子。
曾经支持我们属国的独立
目前支持我们属国的独立

original: Merchant republics or trade companies trading in a Trade Node will grant a bonus to Goods Produced proportional to their share of Trade Power.
translation: 商业共和国或贸易公司在贸易节点的交易将根据他们拥有的贸易竞争力给予货物生产百分比奖励。

original: Merchant republics or trade companies trading in a Trade Node will grant a bonus to Goods Produced proportional to their share of Trade Power. Being a member in a Trade League further multiplies this bonus.
translation: 商业共和国或贸易公司在贸易节点的交易将根据他们拥有的贸易竞争力给予货物生产百分比奖励。加入贸易联盟可以进一步增加这个奖励。

original: The 'Rich Mountain' or Great Silver mountain of Potosí is the site of one of the richest Silver mines in the world. Between 1575 and 1600 this mine alone accounted for half of the silver mined in the Americas.
translation: 波托西的银矿山——富饶山，是世界上最富饶的银矿之一。在1575年到1600年之间，该矿山产出了全美洲一半的银矿石。

original: As the site of the only notable diamond mines in the entire world the diamond markets of Golconda have become synonymous with great riches.
translation: 作为世界上最显著的钻石矿所在地，戈尔孔达的钻石市场已经成为了财富的代言词。

original: This is a major entrepôt for the export of spices and the point of origin for a large portion of the world's export of Nutmeg, Cloves, and other spices.
translation: 这里是香料出口的主要转口港，以及世界贸易中大部分豆蔻、丁香和其他香料的发源地。

original: Faction loyal to us in this province have prepared for our take over, making its integration into our state much smoother and more efficient than it otherwise would be.
translation: 这个省份的忠诚派系准备好接受我们的统治。这使得将其整合入我们国家的效率更高且更加温和。

original: The capture and annexation of a symbolically important region has inspired our population. Recruiters all over our country are reporting an increased interest among our subjects to join the army.
translation: 成功吞并重要的地区激励了国人。征兵官汇报全国各地的普通人踊跃参军。

original: By ousting all rival agents from other European powers in Italy we have given our own cities in the area an opportunity to thrive.
translation: 我们驱逐了一切外来者在意大利的代理人。这使得自己的土地可以自由发展，繁荣。

original: Our Merchants are profiting from the recent conquest of a number of Italian cities and many of their able men of the Italian renaissance are now flocking to our court.
translation: 商人正在从最近占领的意大利城市中从事贸易获取利润。许多意大利文艺复兴的名人都来到我们的宫廷。

original: Our shipbuilding sector is expanding due to having acquired access to the ports and resources it needs to thrive.
translation: 受日益增多的港口和资源刺激，我们的造船业迅速扩张。

original: Due to the increasing importance of trade in our society the status of all trade related professions have risen sharply recently. More and more people that never would have considered it before are now seeking their fortune in various overseas endeavors and as a result a great influx of new ideas has revitalized our trade.
translation: 贸易在我国的重要性日益凸显。与之相关的各行各业也迅猛发展。许多未曾涉足过此领域的人也开始出海贸易获取财富。这样浓厚的气氛产生了大量新思想，最后又促进了贸易的进步。

original: Our efforts to secure more sources of Spices have not gone unnoticed by the domestic Spice Merchants. Confident that the state are looking after their interests they have been unusually forthcoming with any taxes or fees they are required to pay.
translation: 我们对香料资源与贸易的保护引起了当地商人的注意。他们相信政府在征收了税费后会保护他们的资产。

original: Our efforts to secure more sources of Chinaware have not gone unnoticed by the domestic Merchants. Confident that the state are looking after their interests they have been unusually forthcoming with any taxes or fees they are required to pay.
translation: 我们对瓷器资源与贸易的保护引起了当地商人的注意。他们相信政府在征收了税费后会保护他们的资产。

original: Your actions have upset the people in this province.
translation: 你的所作所为使该省份的人民不高兴。

original: Your recent actions have pleased the people in this province.
translation: 你最近的作为使该省份的人民高兴。

original: The angry peasants are more than upset about your recent actions.
translation: 愤怒的农民对你近期的行为非常不满。

original: Our decisive move to repay our debt has impressed the financial community.
translation: 我们偿还所有债务的决心感动了金融界。

original: After a long bout of warfare our nation has finally been given an opportunity to catch its breath. As granaries refill and a new generation of subjects begins to near the age of adulthood it seems our nation has finally recovered.
translation: 在长时间的战争后，我国终于能够喘口气了。谷仓再次满盈，新一代的臣民们即将成年，看来我国终于恢复过来了。

original: We have allowed the manpower reserves of our country to refill and as a result the fields are being worked again and our economy is recovering.
translation: 我们允许保存我国的人力从而使之恢复，这样土地上再次有人劳动，我国们的经济正在恢复。

original: Our grip on the Curia is stronger than it once was. Our Papal emissaries report that their word now count for more than it once did.
translation: 我们对教廷的掌控强于过去。我们的教廷使者说，他们的话语比以前更有重量。

original: Together with representatives of all of the religious institutions in our country and at the Curia we have undertaken a campaign to control the Papal Curia. Apart from the benefits that controlling the Curia itself can give the great success of this campaign has greatly increased the popularity of our state and the prestige of the church itself in our country.
translation: 与我国所有宗教机构和在教廷的代表一起，我们进行了旨在控制教廷的行动。除了从控制教廷本身能够得到的好处之外，这次行动的成功也使国内民众的支持及教会的威望得到了提升。

original: The successful conversion of a region of non-believers lately has given our missionaries increased motivation to continue their work.
translation: 最近使一个地区的无信者皈依的成功鼓舞了我们的传教士，增进了他们继续传教的动力。

original: Our successful campaign to bring foreign rulers back into the Catholic fold has not gone unnoticed and has helped our influence in the Papal Curia as well as impressed the remaining heretics subject to our rule.
translation: 我们成功将外国统治者劝回天主教会的行动已被注意到，这提升了我们在教廷的影响力，同时还撼动了在我国统治下的异端臣民。

original: Making the right diplomatic moves at the right time has improved our international reputation.
translation: 适时采取正确的外交行动，提高了我们的国际声誉。

original: We have saved Jerusalem from the infidels. Righteous Christians all over our country will never forget the great service our ruler has made to Christendom.
translation: 我们从异教徒手中拯救了耶路撒冷。全国正直的基督徒都不会忘记我们的统治者对基督教世界所做的贡献。

original: We have saved Mecca from the infidels. Righteous Muslims all over our country will never forget how our ruler has defended the Holy City.
translation: 我们从卡费勒手中拯救了麦加。全国正直的穆斯林都不会忘记我们的统治者是如何保卫圣城的。

original: The conversion of a high profile Pagan area has benefited our missionaries both through what they have learned in doing so and because the newly converted Christians have helped spread the words among others of their old faith.
translation: 一个充满了异教徒的地域皈依，既是我们的传教士尽他们所学之由，亦是新皈依的基督徒帮助在他们的旧宗教中传播福音的原因。

original: After having been invested in at the right time this colony is growing rapidly and its port has become a major destination for the colonists traveling from our country to this region.
translation: 这块殖民地因适时的投资而发展迅速，其港口成为了从我国来的殖民者的主要目的地。

original: We have successfully defended the lowlands against outside control.
translation: 我们已从外来者的控制中成功保卫了低地苏格兰。

original: Our ruler was once despised and disliked by large portions of our population. Many claimed that he had no right to his throne. Now nobody would dream of saying such a thing, by turning the situation around completely our rulers claim has become stronger than ever.
translation: 我们的统治者曾为大多数民众所鄙视不喜。许多人声称他没有资格继承王位。现在没人会想说这样的话了，在形势完全逆转后，我们的统治者前所未有地强大。

original: Through our successful campaigns to free Europe of the Ottomans we have gained the gratitude of all our Christian subjects, old and new.
translation: 通过我们成功从奥斯曼下解放欧洲的战役，我们获得了所有新旧基督教臣子的感激。

original: Our campaign to defend this area from the French has allowed us to strengthen its defenses and our grip over it.
translation: 我们从法国手中保卫此地的战役使我们加强了防御，并牢牢掌握住了此地。

original: We have restored the Holy See to its rightful place. Forever imprinting the name of our great nation in the annals of history and ensuring that we have the love of the faithful within our borders as well as the Curia itself. At least for now.
translation: 我们将圣座迎回了正确的地方。在编年史上永远镌刻着我们伟大的国家之名，至少现在，我们向世界确认了我国对信仰的热爱，无论在国内还是教廷。

original: Due to his efficient defense against the Hungarians our monarch is enjoying a greatly increased popularity.
translation: 我们的君主因有效抵御了匈牙利人，而获得了大量人望。

original: The subjugation of a symbolically important region has inspired our population. Recruiters all over our country are reporting an increased interest among our subjects to join the army.
translation: 成功征服极其重要的地区，激励了民众。征兵官们纷纷上书，说臣民们踊跃参军。

original: Having united the Jurchens our ruler now enjoys the support of all Manchus. The time has come to put our differences aside and strike against our enemies.
translation: 统一了女真人之后，我们的统治者获得了全部满人的支持。是时候抛弃我们的分歧，一同进攻共同的敌人了。

original: With the fall of England's last possessions in France a great victory has been won and the country can finally start to recover.
translation: 随着英国在法国最后一个据点的陷落，我国赢得了这场伟大胜利，国家终于可以开始恢复生息了。

original: By forcibly taking control over the ports of the Baltic we have secured a competitive edge for our traders. At least for the time being.
translation: 在武力控制波罗的海沿岸的港口之后，我们暂时确保了我们商人的竞争优势。

original: Having thrown out the last of the Swedish troops from Denmark our ruler now enjoys great support from the general population and our country can finally begin the process of rebuilding itself.
translation: 将最后一支瑞典军队赶出丹麦后，现在我们的统治者大获民心，我国终于开始战后重建。

original: By expanding into this area we hope to set up a frontier against the Nomad raiders that have so often plagued us. Therefore special attention is also given to these defenses.
translation: 扩张至此地，我们希望建立一条边境前线，以对抗一直袭扰我国的游牧抢掠者。所以此地也备受关注。

original: Heresy is spreading like a wildfire in Europe. But not in Italy. Here the population is safe knowing that God and the Holy Father protect them.
translation: 异端如野火般在欧陆蔓延。但不包括意大利，因为此地的人民知道，在上帝和圣父教宗的保佑下，他们是安全的。

original: Our victory over our old rivals in the Byzantine Empire has strengthened the support for our ruler.
translation: 对我们的旧日宿敌拜占庭帝国的胜利，使我们统治者的支持得以强化。

original: By extending our control over certain key locations in the Mediterranean Sea we have strengthened our grip on the trade in the area.
translation: 通过扩张至地中海中的几个关键地区，我们牢牢掌控住了此区域的贸易。

original: We have secured important ports along the Black Sea which has strengthened our hold over the trade in the area.
translation: 我们确保了在黑海沿岸的重要港口，这加强了我们对该地区贸易的掌握。

original: By extending our control over the ports along the Indian Ocean and adjacent waters we have come to benefit from a temporary increase in trade revenue.
translation: 通过控制印度洋其附近水域沿岸的港口，使我们的贸易收入暂时增加。

original: By extending our control over the overland trade routes in India we have come to benefit from an increased trade revenue.
translation: 通过控制印度内陆的贸易线路，使我们的贸易收入增加了。

original: We have defended the Transoxianian lands that Timur, the great founder of our dynasty, once regarded as his home. Our ability to defend this region from other dynasties has done much to strengthen the support of our ruler among the chiefs.
translation: 我们成功保卫了河中地区，这片我朝伟大的开国之祖——帖木儿的故土。我们保护这片区域免受他国入侵的能力，加强了诸酋长对我们统治者的支持。

original: Afghanistan controls the overland route between India, Persia and Transoxiana and it is also a good area recruitment area with close ties to the subcontinent.
translation: 阿富汗控制着印度、波斯及河中的陆上贸易路线，亦是一处紧密联系次大陆的风水宝地及征兵的好地方。

original: The Persian state is no longer a factor in Khorasan. Our ruler's reputation as a conqueror has inspired a wave of recruits to flock to our banners and our merchant class is now exploiting the opportunities that abound in the newly conquered lands.
translation: 波斯不再属于呼罗珊。我国统治者作为征服者的威望激起了到其麾下从军的浪潮，商人阶级在新征服的土地上寻找着遍地都是的机会。

original: The wild Steppes have for centuries been home to various groups that have made life very hard for the faithful Russian people. By pacifying these open areas we have made sure that our population is safe and kept back the Muslim nomads.
translation: 荒芜的大草原数世纪来一直是许多不同部落的故乡，他们使忠实的俄罗斯人民生活艰难。平定这些开阔区域，我们确保了我们的人民不受穆斯林游牧民的袭扰。

original: Our successful efforts to strengthen the true faith in our country have led to a temporary surge of support for our ruler and the state.
translation: 我们在国内加强正信的成功努力，暂时掀起了一股的对我国统治者和国家支持的浪潮。

original: The many orders to the shipyards of our country have resulted in a thriving shipbuilding sector which in turn means cheaper and more efficiently produced ships for the state.
translation: 我国船坞的诸多订单使造船业繁荣，这意味着我国的船只更便宜、生产更快。

original: Our increasingly successful ambition to be seen as the one state of the British Isles has lent a new weight to our words and our international reputation.
translation: 我们被认为是不列颠群岛唯一国家的雄心逐渐实现，这使我国的话语权和国际威望不断增加。

original: Our successful struggle to complete the Reconquista and to make Iberia safe from Muslim incursions for all future has left our armies with both valuable experience and a stronger determination.
translation: 我们完成收复失地运动的成功奋斗，使伊比利亚永久地从穆斯林侵略中解脱，这使我们的军队拥有了宝贵的经验及强大的决心。

original: Our growing control over the North-Italian mainland has allowed us to get rid of many older administrative traditions and allowed us to tax all our mainland possessions much more efficiently.
translation: 我们在北意大利大陆日渐增强的统治使我们可抛弃旧有的行政传统，并在大陆属地更有效率地收税。

original: With a firm reestablished grip over the states of Russian and Ruthenian areas in our sphere of influence we are seen as the natural continuation of the greater states in the history of the area and for our subjects any thoughts of independence seem more and more distant.
translation: 重新牢牢控制罗斯诸国及卢塞尼亚地区在我们的势力范围之下，我们自然被视作历史上该地区大国的正统继承，我们臣民独立的想法似乎越来越遥远了。

original: The Polish state has outlived itself and as other neighbors we aim to take its place. Our great success in this ambition has led to the rest of Europe regarding us with a newfound respect. The acquisition of the land itself has greatly eased the communications within our state and as a result income from taxes is temporarily higher.
translation: 波兰国已经落伍了，同其他邻国一样，我们觊觎取而代之。我们这个抱负的成功，使得欧洲其他国家给予我们新的尊重。得到这片土地本身极大地缓解了国内的通讯压力，因此税务收入一时高企。

original: The Lithuanian state has outlived itself and as other neighbors we aim to take its place. Our great success in this ambition has led to the rest of Europe regarding us with a newfound respect.
translation: 立陶宛已经落伍了，同其他邻国一样，我们觊觎取而代之。我们这个抱负的成功，使得欧洲其他国家给予我们新的尊重。

original: We are working for the rise of Prussia as a strong and unified state in Eastern Germany and Poland.
translation: 我们正在努力使普鲁士成为东德意志及波兰的一个统一的区域性强国。

original: All our subjects must participate in our rituals and will be graced at least once by the leader of our religion in order to make them see the light of the true faith.
translation: 我们所有臣民都要参加祭典，并至少被我们宗教领袖祝圣一次，以使他们见到正信之光。

original: We are involving all our subjects in great sacrificial ceremonies in their regional centers to immerse them in our religion.
translation: 我们使所有臣民参与他们地区中心的献祭大典，来将他们吸收进我们的宗教。

original: We have chosen to embrace the syncretic elements of Tengriism and have adopted a number of aspects from Buddhist rituals and ceremonies into our faith.
translation: 我们选择了拥抱长生天教义中合一的元素，并采用了一些来自佛教仪式及庆典的要素加入我们的信仰。

original: We have rejected any religious syncretism and have instead chosen to spread an as pure version of the ancient faith of our ancestors as we can among our subjects. We have therefore chosen to empower the Black Shamans among our people as they have similarly rejected outside influences.
translation: 我们摈斥了一切宗教兼容的观点，而选择了更加纯洁的祖宗的古老信仰，尽量在臣民中传播。故而我们选择加强了萨满黑教在民众中的力量，使他们同样拒斥外来影响。

original: We are encouraging all subjects under our care to learn about our religion and take the rites of admission.
translation: 我们鼓励所有在我们观照下的臣民，学习我们的宗教，并进行入教典礼。

original: We have rekindled the Royal Fires once lit by Zoroaster himself. While they are still young they act as a symbol of the renewed strength of the Zoroastrian faith and of the state that protects them.
translation: 我们重燃了琐罗亚斯德亲自点燃过的皇家圣火。从前圣火曾作为祆教信仰永续和保卫圣火的国家的标志。

original: We have reunited the Zoroastrian lands in Persia and India and created a stronger and purer state for both communities.
translation: 我们重新统一了所有在波斯和印度的祆教区域，建立了一个更强盛、纯洁的共同体。

original: We are promoting the knowledge of our ancient rituals among all of our subjects, especially those who lack the proper veneration for our faith. Once they have learned about the true nature of the world and the spirits that inhabit it they will see the error of their old ways.
translation: 我们致力传播我们古老仪式的知识给所有臣民，特别是那些对我们宗教毫无敬意的人。一旦他们学到了世界的真正本质，及居住于其中的各路神明，他们就会了解他们以前对世界的看法是多么谬误。

original: We are actively purging our faith of all syncretic elements and outside influences. Promoting a purer and stronger version of our faith.
translation: 我们正在净化我们宗教中一切融合元素和外来影响，传扬更加纯洁强大的宗教。

original: We have adopted an active policy of sending our most charismatic Shamans deep into the areas of unbelievers to make them see the virtues of our religion. These Shamans will watch over them and teach others to take their place once they are gone.
translation: 我们采取积极政策，派出最有魅力的萨满深入不信者的区域，使他们看到我们信仰的优点。这些萨满将照管他们，并培养他们的继任者。

original: We have created a written version of our faith to be used for educating our subjects and spreading the traditions of our people in foreign lands.
translation: 我们将我们的信仰付诸书面，以教育臣民，并传播我国民的传统到国外。

original: Cairo has grown huge and unwieldy, sanitation and urban planning has been suffering for too long. We have therefore begun an ambitious urban planning project to get the city growth under control and eventually reach even higher sizes.
translation: 开罗成长得太庞大臃肿了，城市卫生和规划长期苦于此。于是我们开始进行一项雄心勃勃的城市规划工程，使城市在控制下发展，最终使其发展得更大。

original: By furthering the positions of our kingdom as the regional hegemon in our part of Europe we have managed to gain a much stronger support for our monarchs at home.
translation: 促进我国作为地区霸主的地位使我国君主在本土获得更强的支持。

original: By furthering the position of our duchy in southern Germany we are increasingly seen as the dominant power in the area which helps outsiders to overlook any minor transgressions on our part.
translation: 促进我公国在南德意志的地位，使我们成为了该地区的主导力量，外人就会不在意我们的小错。

original: We are on our way to restore the Roman Empire to its former glory. While most view our attempts with contempt at best our old titles and ancient history give extra substance to all our claims.
translation: 我们正在恢复罗马帝国昔日的荣光。就在多数人轻蔑看待我们的努力的同时，我们的古老头衔及历史给了我们所有宣称额外的实质支持。

original: By extending our control over areas bordering the traditional lands of France we have created favorable conditions for centralizing our control over the domains under our control.
translation: 通过在传统的法兰西边界外的扩张，我们获得了在集权化我国控制区域的有力地位。

original: The papacy has sanctioned our right to tax the faithful of our nation for a period, boosting our tax income substantially.
translation: 教宗国特许我们对我国信众收税一段时间，大大增加了我国税收。

original: The pope has extended his blessing upon our ruler and our country, greatly increasing our standing both abroad and internally.
translation: 教宗祝福了我国及其统治者，使我们国内外的威望大大提升。

original: The pope has issued a bull sanctioning the past actions of the rulers of our dynasty and stating the divine right we have to the throne of our kingdom.
translation: 教宗发布敕令，认可了我朝统治者过去的行为，并宣布我们对我国王位有神圣的权利。

original: The Papacy has seen fit to declare its support for the wars our country is currently involved in, greatly increasing the enthusiasm among the greater population to join our armies.
translation: 教宗看起来在我国目前卷入的战争中支持我们一方，极大鼓舞了民众参军的热情。

original: A papal legate has been attached to our court to assist in our diplomatic endeavors with both his expertise and the added respect his very presence brings to negotiations.
translation: 一位教宗使节来到我国宫廷，协助我们的外交努力，利用他的专长及他在场的威望获得了尊重，帮助谈判。

original: Through a combination of windmills, dikes and any means at their disposal the inhabitants of this region have managed to negate the hardships of the swampy terrain of the region. As a direct result the city of Amsterdam is now quickly growing to become one of the major economic centers of the region.
translation: 通过联合使用风车、水渠及一切能使用的方法，该地的居民排除万难，生活在这个充满沼泽的地区。直接结果是，阿姆斯特丹市现在迅速成长为该地区的主要经济中心。

original: We have realized the dream of the warrior king Kapilendra and subdued the weak lands that surround Orissa. The tales of our deeds and the name of our country have spread like a wildfire and now many lordless Telugu warriors are flocking to our ranks.
translation: 我们实现了战士王开浦林陀罗的梦想，征服了奥里萨周边孱弱的土地。我们的英勇事迹和我国威名像野火一般传播，现在许多无主的泰卢固战士涌向我们一方。

original: With the acquisition of Mazovia by the Polish kings the region has quickly grown in importance. Its situation between the economic heartlands of the Polish and Lithuanian states makes it an ideal stop for traders as well as a good location for the Sejm to convene.
translation: 波兰国王获得了马佐维亚之后，该地区重要性大大提升。因其在波兰、立陶宛的经济腹地之间，使该地成为了一个商旅理想的停留点，同时也是召集色姆（国会）开会的理想地点。

original: The Star Chamber is a court composed of privy councilors and common-law judges. The high position of this court ensures that we can prosecute even socially and politically prominent offenders. While the court is in general a great way to promote Royal Justice in our lands some MPs are opposed to what they see as arbitrary rulings designed to strengthen the monarchy.
translation: 星室法庭是一个由枢密院成员和普通法法官组成的法庭。该法庭的崇高地位使得我们甚至可以起诉社会上和政治上的高层反对者。但该法庭大体上却是在我国促进君主权利的绝妙方法，一些议员反对，视之为意在加强君主力量的专制统治。

original: By ensuring to maintain the support of our electors we have strengthened our influence in the Empire.
translation: 确保了选侯们的支持，我们加强了在帝国内的影响力。

original: We have affirmed the rights of the nobility to act independently of the monarch in their own domains. While this has pleased many nobles greatly it has meant a loss of state authority nationally.
translation: 我们已经肯定了贵族在自己的领地独立行事的君主权利，虽然这会然让许多贵族高兴但它也意味着国家权力的中央集中性的丧失。

original: A new ruling class, the Maroserana, has emerged. Both adopting and changing many local customs, they are centralizing and formalizing aspects of Malagasy society.
translation: 一个新的统治阶级——马鲁塞拉纳——已经出现，它同时扬弃了许多当地习俗，这们是马达加斯加社会集权化和正规化的表现。

original: The council which rules alongside the chief has been expanded and given more influence with the blessing of the chief's family.
translation: 辅佐酋长统治的长老会已经扩大，并会对酋长的统治施加更大影响。

original: With our merchants being well-known to make honest deals and be upfront about business, people around the world wish to make deals with them.
translation: 我们的商人因为诚信和直接而美名远扬，世界各地的人们都期待与他们交易

original: Smugglers who previously eluded us are now on our payroll to spy on our enemies.
translation: 以前躲避我们的走私者现在由我们出资进行对敌对国家的间谍工作。

original: Local business is corrupt, with much of the export disappearing to the black market.
translation: 地方经济由于出口贸易流入地下市场走向崩溃。

original: Foreigners have come to associate our people with lies and fraud, preferring not to do business with our merchants.
translation: 外国人将我们视作谎言与骗子的代言人，不愿与我们的商人团交易。

original: For generations we have dreamed of circumventing Mediterranean trade by finding the sea route to India, freeing us from the reliance on foreign traders and caravans. At last that dream seems within reach.
translation: 我们世世代代以来都梦想着通过找到通往印度的海航路线以绕过地中海区域进行贸易活动，将我们从对外国商团与商队的依赖中解放出来。终于，这个梦想快要实现了。

original: Despite the wishes of most of the Tuscan people, we have pushed through reforms to bring Tuscany into the future.
translation: 不顾大部分托斯卡纳人的意愿，我们为了托斯卡纳的未来推行了改革。

original: The Construction Projects of the Duke
We have extensively developed the lands around Pisa, and improved trade routes to Firenze.
translation: 我们已经广泛地建设了比萨附近的国土，并升级了前往佛罗伦萨的交易路线。

original: The city treasury of Florence is interchangeable with the Duke's personal treasury. And the Duke really doesn't mind.
translation: 城市金库与公爵的个人金库是可以进行资金周转的，且我们的公爵并不介意。

original: The city treasury of Florence is interchangeable with the Duke's personal treasury. Thankfully the Duke only has the city's best interest at heart.
translation: 城市金库与公爵的个人金库是可以进行资金周转的，我们的公爵一心只为城市办事真是太好了。

original: Controls the frequency of Savonarola events.
translation: 控制萨伏那洛拉事件的频率

original: The Accademia, which our ruler patrons, is encouraging experimentation and rigorous scientific study.
translation: 我们的统治者所资助的学会正促进着实验和严格科学研究的进行。

original: We have turned the informal Accademia del Cimento into a national institution.
translation: 我们将非正规的实验学会整编为国有实验学会

original: The Chewa are one with us, and we are one with them.
translation: 切瓦人成为了我们民族中的一员。

original: Our great ironwork fields are working day and night to arm our people.
translation: 我们规模庞大的铁匠工场正日夜武装着我们的人民。

original: Our people are organized by the secret societies of their religion.
translation: 我们的人民被他们所信仰宗教的秘密社团组织了起来。

original: The Oriental Press prints works in Arabic, causing greater communication with Muslim scientists and philosophers. With the intention of converting them, of course.
translation: 为了拉拢穆斯林的科学家以及哲学家，位于阿拉伯的东方印刷厂给予了他们更好的交流渠道。

original: Feuds between the troops from different parties in the trade league cause problems in our army.
translation: 不同贸易联盟派系的军队间的仇恨给我们的军队造成了麻烦。

original: Merchants from a nation in our trade league are upset about having to pay taxes they had previously avoided.
translation: 来自同一贸易联盟中某个国家的商团因为要付本可避免的税而感到不满。

original: Pirates who used to cause us trouble are now serving under our flag as privateers.
translation: 以前被他国雇佣，给我们制造麻烦的海盗，现已为我们服务。

original: The public execution of an infamous pirate band has served as an example to all.
translation: 臭名昭著的海盗团被公开处决示众。

original: Low-cost, low-quality materials are used for the construction of our ships.
translation: 低价，低质量材料被用于船只建造。

original: Advances in accounting allow us to execute transactions more efficiently.
translation: 先进的会计学使我们在交易时更加高效。

original: The nobility has seized power entirely from an already weakened king, now merely serving as a figurehead in a completely decentralized state.
translation: 贵族从我们已经被削弱的国王手里夺取了所有的权利，仅将国王作为一个没有任何实权的傀儡供着。

original: The Emperor views our Grand Duchy as an affront to his authority.
translation: 皇帝认为我们的公国是对他权威的侮辱。

original: We are working for the rise of Russia as a strong and unified state to rule Eastern Europe.
translation: 我们正为建立以一个足以统治东欧的强大而又统一的俄国努力奋斗着。

original: Through daring use of force we have intimidated those trafficking the Swahili Trade ports to pay tolls to us.
translation: 通过大胆地武力威吓，途径斯瓦西里港口的商贩将向我们付通行费。

original: Local authorities are frustrated by the lack of formal institutions in our system of government and are instead increasingly relying on local government institutions.
translation: 地方上对我们迟迟不建立正式的行政机构感到失望，反而越来越依赖地方机构。

original: We have given in to the demands of local authorities to to root out the worst forms of power abuse in our government, allowing for more modern institutions to grow in our country. While generally beneficial this will also result in a good deal of tension.
translation: 我们已经要求地方当局戒除滥用职权行为，以发展中央对地方的控制力。 这虽然有益但也将导致很大的紧张。

original: By introducing new crops and allowing higher yields from areas where the cold magnates and farmer capitalists hold less influence we have upset these interest groups.
translation: 通过引进新的作物，使黑心商人和无良农场主影响力较小的地区作物产量提高，我们让这些利益集团慌了。

original: The state has attempted to get local farmers to introduce a number of crops from the Americas. This has generally increased output but have upset those who formerly dominated the agricultural sector of the province.
translation: 国家试图让当地农民种植一些从美洲引进的作物。这普遍提高了产量，但却使以往控制该省农业的人感到不安。

original: Publications containing a number of vile and untrue accusations have come in very widespread circulation in this area.
translation: 包含一些不实指控的出版物在这一区域得到了广泛的传播。

original: We have struck down hard at all printers in this area to prevent them from spreading any lies or slander of the central government. These actions seem to have brought a new peace to the region, even if it comes at the cost of some printers who moved their business elsewhere.
translation: 我们努力控制这个地区的所有出版社，阻止他们传播中央政府的谎言或诽谤。 这些行动似乎给该地区带来了新的和平，即使是以关停某些出版社为代价。

original: Groups of Botanists, Geologists, Zoologists and Sociologists have studied our country and documented everything they found interesting. This knowledge has then been printed and spread for the benefit of mankind: While this lofty goal is admirable it also means that everyone who wishes can take part of knowledge of where our valuable natural resources are and to a certain extent how well we utilize and guard them.
translation: 植物学家，地质学家，动物学家和社会学家团体勘探了我们的国家，并记录了他们发现的有趣的一切。 这种知识被印刷和传播，造福于人类：虽然这个崇高的目标令人钦佩，但也意味着每个有想法的人都可以了解我们宝贵的自然资源在哪里，一定程度上检验了我们利用和保卫它们的能力。

original: This area is experiencing a quickening spread of ideas due to the widespread toleration of all kinds of criticism by the public. While we might stand to learn much from the general public having our faults highlighted has not done much to improve our public image.
translation: 由于我们的言论自由政策，这一区域各种想法传播很快。 舆论是我们更容易意识到自己的错误，但这也对我们的形象不利。

original: We have temporarily restricted the right to meet in larger groups to avoid the detrimental effects of wild discussions
translation: 我们暂时限制了大规模公众集会，以避免不受控制的议论的不利影响

original: The local strongmen of this area have built a stronger power base for themselves based on raiding their neighbors for slaves that they then sell to foreign merchants.
translation: 这个地区的豪强通过劫掠邻居，将其卖为奴隶，使自身发展壮大。

original: This was one of our earliest slave entrepots in this region and has remained a major centre of the slave trade ever since.
translation: 这是我们这个地区最早的奴隶口岸之一，且一直是奴隶贸易的中心。

original: A set of tight regulations and royal monopolies ensure that all slave trade must pass this point in our country.
translation: 一系列强制规定确保了所有的奴隶贸易必须经过我国该地。

original: Our export sector is very much dominated by a thriving slaving secor. We are selling large quantities of our countrymen to the merchants of far-away countries. While this hurts our country in many ways it has given us access not only to a steady source of income but to a source of technology we would otherwise lack.
translation: 我们的出口部门经营着一个蓬勃发展的奴隶市场。 我们正在向远方国家的商人出售大量的同胞。 虽然这在很多方面损害了我们的国家，但它使我们不仅获得了稳定的收入来源，而且获得了我们原本缺乏的技术来源。

original: Our ruler has made a habit out of occasionally visiting our army encampments, instilling great courage in the hearts of our troops.
translation: 我们的统治者习惯于偶尔视察军营，他在我们军队的心中灌输了勇气。

original: Our ruler is an inspiring conqueror and have had many marching songs written in their honor.
translation: 我们的统治者是一个鼓舞人心的征服者，并有许多歌颂他的歌曲。

original: A European Trading Company have been granted extensive rights to set up a presence in this province.
translation: 某欧洲贸易公司已获准在该省成立。

original: By continuing to attack and destroy the bases of the Tatar raiders on our frontier we are encouraging our Russian subjects to resettle the steppes.
translation: 通过继续袭击和摧毁我们边界上鞑靼袭击者的营地，我们正在鼓励我们俄罗斯人民重新在草原定居。

original: By using our military might to safeguard our settlements in Siberia we have managed to encourage our subjects to settle the region.
translation: 通过利用我们的军事力量维护西伯利亚的定居点，我们使我们的人民来此处定居。

original: By discouraging intellectual pursuits we have slowed down the spread of new ideas in our society.
translation: 通过愚民政策，我们已经放慢了新思想在社会中的传播。

original: The gifted men and women that our rulers like to surround themselves with have been granted more far-reaching powers to rule in our time of need. Unlike the Nobility or Provincial elites these advisors are loyal only to the state. This ensures everything is business as usual, and quite impresses some of our neighbors.
translation: 我们的统治者赋予身边红人中有能力者更多的权力。 与贵族及地方精英不同，这些人只对国家忠诚。 这确保了国家的控制力。此事令我们的一些邻居印象深刻。

original: In order to better assert our authority we have created a new chancellery where we have begun to switch out administrators tied to the clergy to instead rely more closely on secular officials loyal to the crown.
translation: 为了更好地集权，我们已经建立了一个新的内阁，我们已经开始将与宗教势力有勾搭的官员换为更加世俗化且忠于国王的世俗官员。

original: An army of architects and builders have begun to reshape Berlin and Cölln from a modest German capital into a great city of the world. We are building palaces, fortifications, roads, gardens and churches as well as clearing forests and draining the many swamps that plague urban development in this province.
translation: 一批建筑师已经开始将柏林和科恩从普通的的德国首都改建为伟大的世界级城市。 我们正在建造宫殿，防御工事，道路，花园和教堂，以及清理森林，并抽干许多引发瘟疫的沼泽地。

original: Due to an extensive effort to make the province around our royal capital a more viable place for a great city we have managed to merge the former cities of Berlin and Cölln while creating better conditions for future growth. Our renovations have also turned what was once a modest city into a properly impressive Baroque capital of our dynasty.
translation: 一系列的努力使得我们的首都成为一个伟大的城市的想法更加可行。我们已经设法合并了前柏林和科恩市，为进一步发展创造了更好的条件。 我们的建设把这个曾经很一般的城市变成了我们王朝让人印象深刻的首都。

original: In order to protect Brandenburg from ever being divided younger sons of our dynasty will never inherit part of the Brandenburger lands. Instead all of it will go to the eldest son.
translation: 为了保护勃兰登堡不分裂，我们王朝的非长子永远不会继承勃兰登堡州的任何一部分。 所有这一切都会由长子继承。

original: We have gone to great lengths to unify our internal legal systems, rooting out abuse and malpractices while professionalizing the judiciary.
translation: 我们努力地统一我们的国内的法律制度，根除滥用职权和违法行为，同时使司法机构专业化。

original: The local population will learn the wonders of civilization.
translation: 本地的民众将会了解到文明本身是种何等的奇迹。

original: As a symbol of European enlightenment the beautiful garden palace of Sanssouci is found here.
translation: 作为欧洲启蒙主义的象征，壮丽的花园宫殿“无忧宫”在此建立了。

original: We have chosen to expand central power at the expense of the landholding nobility. They are not amused.
translation: 我们已经决定牺牲容克贵族的地权以加强中央集权。但他们感到不满。

original: We have chosen to expand central power at the expense of the burghers, instead relying on the support of the Junkers. The burghers are not amused.
translation: 我们已经决定牺牲市民们的权益，依靠容克贵族们的支持加强中央集权。市民们感到不满。

original: We've obtained the right to handle finances ourselves, entirely cutting the estates of the land out of the equation. While they retain some rights to avoid taxation themselves this is allowing us to expand our army greatly.
translation: 我们已经得到了自主处理财政的权力，完全把地主阶层排除在外。而他们还保留了一些免除税务的权力，这让我们能极大的扩张军力。

original: The best architects of the realm are currently struggling to complete the palace of Sanssouci to match our ruler's precise vision.
translation: 国内最顶级的建筑师们正努力完成无忧宫的建设，使其能与我们统治者的独具慧眼相称。

original: We have sternly shown all families that engage in Robber Baron activities that we will not tolerate such criminal activity. Any Robber Barons will be executed.
translation: 我们已经掌握了涉嫌“窃国贵族”行为的所有家族，并且绝不会容忍此类罪行。任何“窃国贵族”都将被处决。

original: Out of fear to anger the nobles we have chosen not to act very decisively against the Robber Baron resurgence in our lands. As a result trade is suffering and lawlessness is an increasing problem throughout the realm.
translation: 为了不触怒贵族，我们决定不针对我们领土上的“窃国贵族”采取果断的行动。后果是贸易受创并且整个国内目无法纪者越来越多。

original: We have expanded the privileges and prerogatives of the estate-run Kreditwerk which is one of the most important financial institutions in our state.
translation: 我们扩大了国内最重要的金融机构之一，信誉社的各项特权和便利。
在卑尔根的影响力降低

original: Dutch Merchants are dominating our economy and we are as a result becoming an increasingly naval-oriented country.
translation: 荷兰商人团正在主宰我们的经济，因而我们渐渐变为海军主导的国家。
勘测斯堪地纳维亚山脉

original: We are paying a number of miners and prospectors to leave no stone un-unturned in their search for metals that can be used to create a domestic weapons industry.
translation: 我们派遣了许多矿工和勘测者翻遍每一块石头，寻找能支撑国内兵器工业的金属。

original: The Mining town of Kongsberg has grown into a veritable colony of German speaking miners and entrepreneurs within Norway. Local laws are similar to those of German Mining towns in Saxony and German is the spoken language here in everything from sermons to daily speech.\nNonetheless the Mint at Kongsberg is a welcome and steady source of new income for the state treasury.
translation: 康斯伯格的工矿镇已经全然成为了挪威企业家和说德语的矿工们名副其实的殖民地了。本地的法律接近于萨克森工矿镇的法律，在这里从布道到日常交流都使用德语。\n虽然如此，康斯伯格的铸币业已经成了一种新的，广受欢迎且来源稳定的国库收入来源。

original: The Great fire of Oslo so thoroughly destroyed the city that we are now creating a new capital on the other side of the bay, closer to Akershus fortress. The new capital is planned to withstand both fire and foreign invasions as well as exhibiting the exquisite Baroque taste of our governing class.
translation: 这场大火彻底摧毁了奥斯陆这座城市，而我们现在正准备在海湾的另一边靠近阿克什胡斯要塞的地方建造新的首都。新首都的设计将能经受大火和外敌 入侵的考验，同时还能展现出我们管理层对巴洛克风格的精致品位。

original: Our strong ties with the maritime cities of the Lowlands are facilitating a quick spread of ideas, contacts and institutions in our lands.
translation: 我们与低地沿海城市的紧密联系正在促成我们国土上理念，交流和规章的传播。

original: We have embarked on a policy of limiting the pawning of crown castles to the nobility while reclaiming those that had already been pawned off. This has made us quite unpopular with the nobles of the realm but state income has increased.
translation: 我们出台了一项政策限制向贵族质押王室领土同时收回那些已经质押了的领土。这让我们不太受贵族的欢迎，但国内收入增加了。

original: Our predecessors have had a long-standing policy of solving temporary, if dire, financial problems by pawning of important crown castles to the nobility of the realm. This has severely limited our income from some of the richest parts of the realm.
translation: 我们的先人长期以来通过把王室领土质押给国内贵族来暂时地解决一些问题，比如经济问题。这已经严重限制了我们从王国内最富庶的地方得到收入。

original: Apart from the crown of Denmark Christopher III, also known as Christopher of Bavaria, has inherited the holdings of his father in Oberpfalz. In times of need these can be used to supplement state income.
translation: 除了丹麦国王的王位以外，克里斯托弗三世，也被称为巴伐利亚的克里斯托弗还继承了他父亲在奥伯法尔兹的领地。这里的收入可用作不时之需。

original: One of the most important trading fairs in the Baltic Sea, the Skåne Market is where the herring-rich waters around Øresund and Falsterbo-Skanör are bought by merchants from all over Western Europe. The market has also grown over time to be the major entrepôt for any West-European goods destined for Eastern Scandinavia. There is some cause for concern, however, as the herring seems to have grown less bountiful over time...
translation: 波罗的海最重要的贸易市集之一，斯科讷鱼市位于厄勒海峡和法尔斯特布附近盛产鲱鱼的海域，受到整个西欧商人的光顾。这个市集也成长为西欧货物转口到东斯堪的纳维亚的主要地点。让人有些担忧的是，鲱鱼似乎不如从前那么多了。

original: This province is home to the factory of Dansborg, a Danish trading colony.
translation: 这个省份是丹斯堡贸易站的所在地，这里是丹麦的一个贸易殖民地。

original: Our ruler has set aside the Royal Council of Nobles and Bishops and instead rules with the support of the Merchant Classes. This has not made us popular with many outside the group of leading Burghers but it has facilitated developing our country in a pluralistic direction.
translation: 我们的统治者将贵族与主教们把持的皇家内阁撇在一旁，并依靠商人阶级进行统治。这项举措并没有让我们更受市民团体的欢迎，但它让我们的国家有了更多元化的发展方向。

original: A sudden increase in demand for Oxen and other agricultural goods that our country is rich in has resulted in a substantial economic upswing. As the economic and political power of the great estate owners grow, small time farmer or free peasants are becoming increasingly disenfranchised.
translation: 对我国盛产的牲畜以及其他农产品突然增长的需求使得经济稳步发展。随着大地主们的经济和政治力量增强，小农和自耕农的公民权日渐丧失。

original: By deposing Corfitz Ulfeldt and shattering his power base among the high nobility we have empowered the Danish Monarchy.
translation: 驱逐了科尔菲茨·乌尔费尔特和他在大贵族当中的党羽之后，我们丹麦实行君主制。

original: By giving in to the attempts to curtail the power of the Monarchy by the Royal Council we have seriously weakened our position to rule the kingdom.
translation: 屈服于内阁缩减君权的动议之后，我们执掌王国的地位被严重削弱了。

original: Our once proud monarchy has been reduced to a stamp that prominent nobles put on government decisions. State coffers are systematically being robbed by the same nobles who run our government.
translation: 我们曾经骄傲的君主制已经沦为显赫贵族发出政令时手里小小的印章。国库也被这些把持朝政的贵族们监守自盗。

original: While the House of Osman retain power over our country in name the Ümera have taken control over our family's possessions and snatched all practical power from the imperial household. They are systematically enriching themselves from our income and misusing their power in our name.
translation: 虽然奥斯曼议院保留了我们家族对国家名义上的权力，但埃米尔们已经控制了我们家族的财产、夺取了皇室的所有实际权力。他们有条不紊地把我们的收入纳入私囊并且还冒用我们的名义发号施令。

original: Our once proud state has become entirely dominated by the various minor factions and cliques at our court. Power belongs to those of the Bushi who control the court itself, with the true head of our dynasty reduced to a puppet in their hands.
translation: 宫廷中的各个小派系与集团完全支配了我们曾经自豪的国家。权柄落入掌控宫廷的武士手中，家族真正的领袖沦为这些家伙的傀儡。

original: Our once proud state has become so dominated by the Boyars that our ruler's authority has been reduced beyond all recognition. All decisions still require the name of the sovereign but this is easily amended by a large supply of stamps that a council of our leading aristocrats have free access to.
translation: 我们曾经骄傲的国家已经完全被波雅尔控制了，统治者的权威已经降到了无人关心的地步。所有的决议虽然仍然需要以主权名义，但可以被整个议会的贵族们轻易地篡夺。

original: Local Trade is booming due to the local (and illegal) initiatives of officials in this province that the government has turned a blind eye too.
translation: 由于本地官员对本地（非法的）贸易活动的鼓励和政府的熟视无睹，本地贸易蓬勃发展。

original: Merchants are going out of business in this province after the central government clamped down upon the local regulations that eased up and facilitated trade.
translation: 商人们不再在此地经商，因为政府收紧了本地的便利通商政策。

original: Our actions have enraged the Ikko - Ikki in this province and they are now strongly opposing our rule of the area.
translation: 我们的行为引起了本地一向宗的不满，他们现在发动了一揆反对我们在这里的统治。

original: Our lacking rule has given rise to a number of Millenarian societies causing havoc and destruction in this area.
translation: 我们疏于统治终究引起了千禧年主义结社在此地引起动乱和破坏。

original: The nobles in this area are upset that we stopped a successful military career of a scion of their leading dynasty.
translation: 这个地区的贵族感到不满，因为我们镇压了他们操纵的王朝在此地起兵的行动 。

original: By allowing false edicts to circulate and pretending that they are our own we have given rise to an increasing number of local initiatives to weaken central rule. It is becoming increasingly clear that local governors feel they can do whatever they want.
translation: 放任伪造的法令如同真的法令一样传遍全国，已经使得越来越多的地方想要削弱中央的统治。很明显地方政府觉得他们能够为所欲为。

original: Our inability to protect traders on our roads has resulted in merchants going out of business or finding other ways to protect themselves. Some can no longer pay our taxes while others are reluctant to do so when they get no protection in return.
translation: 我们对道路上商人没法提供保护迫使他们放弃经商，亦或者想办法保护自己。如果不提供保护的话，本就不愿意交税的人们可能就再也不能交税了。

original: In order to safeguard our economy we have had to devote military resources to keeping the law. This is eating into the military budget in dramatic ways.
translation: 为了保护经济我们已经投入了一些军事资源保障法律执行。这将会占用巨量的军事预算。

original: Influenced by the classical ideals of our administrators we have lowered taxes in this state to allow it to prosper.
translation: 受官员们古典主义理念的影响，我们降低了此地的赋税，让这里能繁荣起来。

original: Sometimes a practical approach is required to governing. Our efficient government apparatus has managed to increase taxes on surplus produce.
translation: 有时候施政需要切实的手段。我们高效的政府机构设法提高了过剩产品的赋税。

original: Due to corruption the forts of this province are in a sorry state. Getting them back to be functioning defense installations will take some time.
translation: 这个地区的堡垒年久失修，破败不堪。把这些工事修葺到足以支撑防御需要一些时间。

original: We have temporarily closed down the trade offices in this province to foreign trade and expelled all foreigners to ensure that law and order prevails.
translation: 我们暂时关闭了此地的外贸办事处并驱逐了外国人，以保证政令通畅，秩序井然。

original: We have responded to the wishes of those that want the Imperial Examinations reformed. Renewing not only the system itself but making sure that the new generation that join our cadres are men of intellectual flexibility.
translation: 我们顺应民意将对科举考试进行改制。既要改正旧制，还要确保新晋官员都是机敏的才人。

original: The political climate in the capital has grown increasingly poisonous. As murders and treason become commonplace, governance of the distant provinces suffers.
translation: 帝都的政治氛围愈发毒化。暗杀与谋反频发的当下，边疆地区也愈发不稳。

original: Local Princes in this province are watching central authority crumble with great interest, waiting for their time to strike.
translation: 本地的贵族正对大权虎视眈眈，等待中央政权的崩溃以待起事良机。

original: This state is governed by one of our most gifted official. The optimus of his year and a pride for our entire corps of administrators.
translation: 这个地区由一名能吏执政。他是当世的能臣，也是我们官员中的表率。

original: We have made a large profit by selling weaponry intended for use by our military. This has not escaped the notice of our men, who have been demoralized by the decision to skimp on their equipment.
translation: 我们通过倒卖现役装备赚了一大笔钱。而士兵们因为被克扣的装备感到士气低落。

original: Jokamachi or 'Castle Towns' surrounded Japanese castles, enabling tighter control of the Samurai and greatly improving prosperity.
translation: 城下町，即「城外的市镇」，环绕在日式城堡周围。使得对武士的管控更严格并且大大提升了繁荣度。

original: The merchant guilds, or Za, though they protect the merchants against bandits, samurai and daimyos, have become increasingly monopolistic, powerful and independent and have not been challenged by the country's ruler.
translation: 商人公会，或称“座”，保护商人不受盗匪，武士和大名的迫害。座已渐渐地具有垄断性，力量巨大并且独立的组织，不再轻易地被统治者支配。

original: This province is controlled by the increasingly powerful and independent Za.
translation: 这个地区由如日中天的商人座支配。

original: Our spies have proved their worth, uncovering information of great worth.
translation: 我们的间谍证明了他们的价值，他们发掘了重大的秘密。

original: Though we have become a fearsome force, we deal with our adversaries with tact and respect.
translation: 虽然我们已经成为了强大的势力，但我们始终对敌手抱有敬畏之心。

original: The prevailing peace of late has caused many samurai to seek 'alternative employment' in exploiting and oppressing the local population.
translation: 近来和平的环境让很多武士们寻求通过剥削和欺压百姓来赚一笔“外快”。

original: Our country's monetary policy focuses on minimizing inflation for the good of our general economy.
translation: 我国的货币政策专注于抑制通胀，以利国家宏观经济。

original: Our country's monetary policy focuses on securing loans that are as beneficial to us as possible.
translation: 我国的货币政策专注于确保有利可图的贷款。

original: We have entirely defanged many of the old local institutions in our realm, replacing them with a government controlled bureaucracy.
translation: 我们彻底废除了境内大量的旧的地方机构，代之以政府控制的官僚体系。

original: We have managed to increase our influence over the many local institutions of the realm that at first seemed unwilling to share their power. As a result our state stands stronger and more obedient to central power than ever before.
translation: 我们已设法增强对境内起初不愿意让出权力的那些地方机构的影响力。因此，我们的国家空前地强大、服从中央。

original: Our failure to assert the authority of the central government in the face of outright obstructionism and rebellion in the provinces has left our authority shreds. Our centralization efforts will be hampered for some time to come.
translation: 面对各省的公然抵制和反对，我们没能成功树立中央的权威，如今它已残破不堪。我们的集权努力在一段时间内障碍重重。

original: We have adopted a policy of hardline confrontation against anyone who would object to our centralization policies.
translation: 我们对任何反对集权政策的人采取强硬政策。

original: We have adopted a policy of negotiations towards the provincial power holders with the aim to use central power as leverage to convince locals to give up their ancient rights and traditions.
translation: 为了用中央权力推动地方放弃历史权力和传统，我们对各省权力机构采取了谈判政策。

original: This region is actively trying to avoid paying the taxes that we have levied upon it.
translation: 这个地区积极活动以避免缴纳我们所征的税款。

original: We have forcibly crushed local power holders who stood against our attempts at centralization in this province.
translation: 我们强力压制了那些反对我们在该省推动集权手段的地方机构。

original: Any sign of rebellion in this area will be met with nothing but steel. Our local representatives have been instructed to make an example of any and all signs of separatism.
translation: 此地的任何叛乱迹象都将被钢铁手段消融。我们指示地方代表检举一切分离主义的迹象。

original: We have given a number of far-reaching guarantees to the people of this area to ensure that they don't oppose our efforts to create a stronger and more unified state.
translation: 我们向此地的人民作出了一些长期保证，以确保他们不反对我们创建更强大同一国家的努力。

original: In order to preserve their good relations with neighboring native tribes, our overlord has sent a proclamation forbidding us to attack native tribes. This makes it a lot harder for us to motivate expansion into native lands.
translation: 为保持和邻近原住民部落的良好关系，我们的宗主国宣布禁止我们攻击原住民部落。这使得我们激励本地的土地扩张变得困难多了。

original: This is the Imperial Capital of Japan. Emperors have resided here for centuries and their Court with them. This has made Kyoto the political center of Japan and a crucial point to control for anyone who would desire to exert power over the Imperial Government.\n\n§MA country can take over the Shogunate, and become the overlord of all Daimyo Subjects, by taking the province of Kyoto.§!
translation: 这是日本的帝京。数百年来，天皇及其宫廷居于此地。这使得京都成为日本的政治中心，以及任何企图展示凌驾帝国政府力量者的必争之地。\n\n§M各国国主可以通过上洛即占据京都来继任将军并成为所有大名的宗主。§!
