original: This province is home to the Grand Shrine of Ise. Dedicated to the sun goddess Amaterasu this is one of the holiest places in Shintoism and a major pilgrimage for people from all over Japan.
translation: 此地是伊势神宫的所在地。它专门供奉天照大神，是神道教最重要的圣地之一，也是全日本人民的主要朝圣之地。

original: We are purging all disloyal officials from the administration to create a loyal system government for our empire.
translation: 我们正清洗全部不忠的政府官员，为帝国创建一个忠诚体制政府。

original: Our ruler supports the Hussites, a religious movement founded by Jan Hus in opposition to the Catholic Church. While the movement is very popular among our own subjects this has made the other Christian rulers of Europe hostile to us at best.
translation: 我们的统治者支持胡斯派，这是扬·胡斯创立的反对天主教会的宗教运动。虽然这一运动在我国臣民中颇受欢迎，但在欧洲其他天主教统治者中顶多会引发厌恶之情。

original: This city is experiencing significant economic growth due to the great privileges granted to its merchants on the Siberian frontier.
translation: 该城赋予其在西伯利亚边疆的商人巨大特权，因此正经历显著的经济增长。

original: This province has been granted for a period of many years to one of the influential merchant families of our country. It has been colonized without government involvement but provides very little income to the state until the charter has run out.
translation: 该省被长期授予我国一个显赫的商人家族。它无需政府参与即可殖民，但在特许期结束前只会向国家上缴极少收入。

original: Overly aggressive conduct by fortune seekers have led to a reduction in income from this region and heightened tensions between the local population and these adventurers.
translation: 淘金者的过于激进的行为导致此地收入减少，当地人和冒险者之间的关系也高度紧张。

original: The countryside in this area is controlled by bands of unemployed mercenaries that have turned to banditry for lack of armed conflicts in which they might earn their living.
translation: 此地的乡间被失业的雇佣兵控制，他们因缺乏可供谋生的武装冲突而沦为匪帮。

original: We are actively fighting against an outbreak of banditry in this area headed by unemployed mercenaries.
translation: 我们正积极对抗此地由失业佣兵带领的强盗爆发。

original: We have organized our army to have a costly but professional permanent division. We can wield a mercenary force more efficient than any other country but the cost to do so will keep taxing our economy as long as the army exists.
translation: 我们已在军队组织出一支昂贵但专业的常备师。我们可以比其他国家更有效地掌握雇佣兵，但只要这支军队存在，为此的花费就会持续对我们的经济征税。

original: We have given land in this area to a mercenary captain and his followers in order to prevent them from revolting.
translation: 我们在此授予一位佣兵队长及其追随者土地，以防止他们暴乱。

original: The great fortress of Belgrade is currently in bad disrepair due to the inability of the Hungarian crown to secure funds for its repairs from the Hungarian estates.
translation: 贝尔格莱德大要塞目前严重失修，因为匈牙利王室难以从匈牙利地产中取得修理资金。

original: The Crown is regularly paying extra money to maintain a network of strong fortifications all around our kingdom.
translation: 王室经常支付额外资金，以维护王国周边的强大防御要塞网络。

original: This region was recently converted to the reformed religion and is enjoying an increased influx of ideas and teachings from the wider reformed community in Europe.
translation: 该地区最近转化为改革宗，观念和教义正从欧洲广大改革宗地区不断涌入。

original: We are actively working to limit the spread of the reformation in our country. To this end we have invited the aid of the papacy and the Jesuits.
translation: 我们正积极限制国内宗教改革的传播。为此，我们邀请圣座和耶稣会协助。

original: While the Hungarian estates have elected our ruler to protect them they retain many rights and guarantees that makes their land less integrated than we might have wished for.
translation: 匈牙利各领地选举我们的统治者来保护他们，但他们也保留了许多权利和保障，因此他们的土地并未像我们所希望的那么集中。

original: By giving great concessions to those that wish to resettle in the military frontier regions we have ensured that the local population are in every way oriented towards the defense against our enemies.
translation: 我们给予希望在军事前线地区定居的人们很大让步，以确保当地人民全力对抗我们的敌人。

original: This province is experiencing a great influx of refugees from the Ottoman Empire, making it easier to develop and rebuild the cities here but also causing devastation and friction in itself.
translation: 该省份目前正源源不断涌入大批奥斯曼帝国移民，因此开发和重建城市变得大为简单，但也带来了本地的破坏和摩擦。

original: The local mining is currently booming in this province and in return for exploiting the local city leagues are contributing to the defense of the country.
translation: 该省的地方矿业正蓬勃发展，作为对开发的回报，当地城市同盟正为国防做出贡献。

original: Given a wide range of freedoms the mining communities of this province are growing greatly and the local economy flourishes.
translation: 鉴于宽松的环境，本地采矿群体大为增长，当地经济高速发展。

original: The Slovaks are increasingly fostering a sense of nationalism and have begun to speak up for what they feel is their right to rule themselves.
translation: 斯洛伐克人的民族主义感情不断增加，并开始宣扬他们的感受——应由他们自己来统治自己。

original: The growing Slovak nationalist movement has led to us granting more freedom and autonomy to these provinces.
translation: 不断发展的斯洛伐克民族主义者运动导致我们不断赋予这些省份更多的自由和自治权利。
库鲁茨起义军和法外之徒

original: We are attempting to integrate the irregular Kuruc and Hajdu into our armed forces in the hopes that it will give us an edge over our enemies. This does require turning a blind eye to any transgressions of these men, who can often be former serfs or even bandits.
translation: 我们正试图将零散的库鲁茨起义军和法外之徒融入武装力量，希望能借此取得对敌人的优势。这确实需要对这些过去往往是农奴甚至土匪的人的任何过失睁一只眼闭一只眼。

original: We have spent considerable effort modernizing and renovating this Kremlin. As a result it has grown to be a considerable defensive structure capable of providing shelter and protection for our people and of showing our power to all who care to see.
translation: 我们花了大力气现代化和翻新这座堡垒，现在它已成为可观的防御结构，足以为人民提供住房和保护，并向关心于此的人展示力量。

original: The widespread trust and lack of bribes in our administration means it is a lot more simple for us to maintain than it would have been in most other countries.
translation: 我们官僚系统普遍可信、贿赂不兴，因此维持起来要比大多数别的国家容易得多。
哥萨克暴动和农奴逃亡

original: Following our total loss of control over the Cossack estate our serfs are now abandoning our country in rapidly increasing numbers to join the free Cossacks of the steppe.
translation: 随着我们完全失去对哥萨克庄园的控制，我们的农奴越来越多地抛下国家加入草原上的自由哥萨克。

original: The Nile Delta is one of the most productive grain producing regions in the world and has supplied the great cities of Mediterranean empires for millennia.
translation: 尼罗河三角洲是世界上最盛产粮食的地区之一，并且已经供给了地中海帝国的大城市数千年。

original: As no beans can rival the quality or quantity of Mochan Coffee it has become the main entrepot for Coffee in the world and its name has become synonymous with the name of the drink itself. In order to preserve this advantage the Merchants of Mocha guard the bushes native to these land with greatest possible care.
translation: 没有咖啡豆可以比得上摩卡咖啡的质量或产量，它已经成为时间最主要的咖啡转口港，它的名字也成为了那种饮品的代名词。为了保留这种优势，摩卡的商人尽可能谨慎地守护这些土地上的灌木丛。

original: The atrocities of enemy troops within our lands have been so horrendous that it has united our people behind us.
translation: 敌军在我们土地内的暴行是如此可怕，以至于这让我们的人民联合在我们身后。

original: In peacetime a large number of our salaried soldiers have turned to shopkeeping and craftsmanship, stimulating the local economy of this area.
translation: 和平时期，大量受薪的我国士兵转向管理店铺与手工业，促进了这个区域的本地经济。

original: We are undertaking a project to professionalize the local militias in the far corners of our country.
translation: 以我们国家的长远考虑，我们正执行一个计划来职业化本地民兵。

original: The growth of our professional army has led to a boom in the business for many weapons producers and among them the manufactory in this province.
translation: 我们职业化军队的增长带来了这个省份许多武器生产商与制造厂的贸易繁荣。

original: The placement of military support installations in this province has stimulated urban growth and the local economy.
translation: 这个省份年内军事支援设施的建立将促进城市与本地经济增长。

original: Through extensive, and quite costly, wargames and re-enactment of historical battles our troops and officers are acquiring valuable experience and training for future campaigns.
translation: 通过广泛而花费不菲的军事演习与历史战役的重演，我们的士兵与军官能获得宝贵的经验并为未来的战役做好训练。

original: Our local recruiters have greatly exaggerated the number of soldiers they can muster for personal gain.
translation: 我们的本地征兵官为了私人利益，极大地夸大了他们可以招募到的士兵数量。

original: We are conducting a thorough investigation into the value of the land and people in this state after having found out that our local representatives greatly exaggerated the number of soldiers the state could muster. Going through peoples lives and categorizing all that they own is not likely to earn us many friends among the locals but it increase the efficiency of future recruiting and taxation.
translation: 在发现我们的本地代表极大地夸大了这个直属州可以招募到的士兵数量后，我们已经指示一次对这个直属州的土地价值与人口的彻底调查。通过人们的生活并归类所有人，这可能不会给我们在当地带来多少朋友，但提高了未来招募与税收的效率。

original: We have created a small core of regiments directly under state control that are given the best equipment and most rigorous training. Properly deployed this can give us an edge in combat but above all it helps us find out how we could develop our armed forces going forward.
translation: 我们已经创建了一个直属于国家控制的小型核心军团，给予他们最好的装备与最严格的训练。在战斗中合适地部署他们更会给予我们一把利刃。但最重要的是，它有助于我们了解如何发展我们的武装力量。

original: We have started standardizing uniforms and equipment for all troops under our control. Greatly helping the ability to identify friend from foe in battle as well as fostering the growth of a professional army.
translation: 我们已经开始标准化我们控制下的所有部队的制服与装备。这极大地提高了作战时在敌阵之中辨别游击的能力，同时也为职业化军队播下了种子。

original: Due to the spread of popular literacy the enlightenment ideals and the words of great philosophers are reaching an increasing number of our subjects.
translation: 由于大众文学的传播，启蒙主义思想以及大哲学家的话语被越来越多我们的属民所知晓。

original: This province has grown to a major entrepot for the sale and resale of books. With a great local production as well as a major influx of people from the entire region coming here to buy and sell books.
translation: 这个省份已经成长为售卖与转售书本的一个主要转口。有着当地大量的生产和来自整个地区的大量涌入的人们买卖书籍。

original: This area is famously rich in fish and produces far more of it than any water in the old world.
translation: 这个地区因生产鱼类且数量远超过任何旧世界的水域而出名。

original: This province is home to a thriving stone-cutting industry which is attracting not only valuable stones but also artisans to cut them and merchants looking to purchase them from the entire world.
translation: 这个省份是繁荣的钻石切割工业的发源地，这不仅吸引宝贵的宝石，而且吸引了来切割他们的工匠与来自整个世界的想要购买这些钻石的商人。

original: Shah Rukh has proven himself a true son of Timur and united the lands his father once conquered. For 40 years he has ruled Iran, Khorasan and Transoxiana with an iron fist, putting down any rebellion while patronizing the arts and trades within the entire realm. All Timurid princes have been granted their governorships by him and he is the undisputed leader of the Timurid dynasty.\n\nAt the end of his life, however, Shah Rukhs health is frail and his reach limited. Only time will tell if anyone can take on the role as the one ruler of all Timurid provinces after he is gone.
translation: 沙哈鲁已证明自己是帖木儿的真正儿子，并统一了他父亲曾经征服过的土地。 40年来他以铁拳统治着伊朗，呼罗珊和河中地区，扑灭任何可能的叛乱，同时也保护着整个帝国内的艺术与贸易的繁荣，所有的帖木儿亲王都被他授予了总督权，他是帖木儿王朝无可争议的领袖。\n\n然而，在他生命的最后，沙哈鲁的健康状况很不好而且他的管辖范围有限。只有时间才能证明，在他离开后，谁才是成为整个帖木儿帝国的唯一统治者。

original: We are enforcing laws on how high the buildings owned or constructed by dhimmi can be compared to those of the faithful.
translation: 我们正强制执行关于由齐米拥有或建造的建筑，与真信者的建筑的想比能够建造的高度的法律。

original: [Root.GetName] is home to a major center of perfume production. Local flowers as well as imported incense and other scented products are used by the world's finest noses to create highly sought after exclusive perfumes that are then exported to the entire continent.
translation: [Root.GetName]是一个主要的香料生产中心。本地的花朵与进口的香料以及其他香料产品被世界上最好的嗅觉所使用来创造极受追捧的香水，然后出口到整个大陆。

original: As befits a righteous country we are purging unjust taxes so that our state is more in accordance with the Sharia.
translation: 作为一个遵循道德的国家，我们正在废除不正当的税收，使我们的国家更符合伊斯兰教法的规定。
这个继承人是我们的继承人。

original: The people of this province are happy due to the actions of our royal heir.
translation: 这个省份的民众由于我们继承人的行为而感到快乐。

original: Our ruler, who speak their language and follow their customs, can count of the support of the locals in this province.
translation: 我们的君主，说着他们的话也遵循着他们的风俗，可以获得这个省份当地人的支持。

original: Our ruler seem strange and alienating to many of the locals in this province. They do not trust him or his intentions yet.
translation: 我们的统治者被该省份的居民视为异邦人，他们暂时不相信国王也不支持国王的施政。

original: The people of this province are unhappy and weary of the heresy they see in the capital.
translation: 该省份的居民对横行于首都的异教徒感到不满和厌烦。

original: The people of this province are strongly encouraged by the support of their ruler for their religion.
translation: 来自同一信仰的统治者的支持使该省份的居民倍受鼓舞

original: The people of this province are strongly encouraged by the support of their ruler for their religion.
translation: 来自同一信仰的统治者的支持使该省份的居民倍受鼓舞

original: The people of this province has reacted strongly to a heathen ruler taking power over their country.
translation: 该省份的居民对异教徒夺取国家政权反应强烈.

original: This province has seen widespread opposition to the rule of someone who does not share the culture or religion of their country's ruling classes.
translation: 该省份民众普遍对与本国统治阶级异教异文化的统治者存在不满

original: This province has a large number of recent converts to a religion different from that of the majority. We have taken measures to make sure the province remains firmly faithful to the one true rite.
translation: 该省份最近有大批民众从主流教派改信他教，我们要采取行动确保该省份忠诚于真正的教义。

original: While our [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] is not [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] a true believer in the state religion [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] is suppressing [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] personal beliefs for the good of the state.
translation: 由于我们的 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle][Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself]并不信仰我国官方宗教，为了国家稳定[Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] 必须禁止表达 [Root.Monarch.GetHerHis] 个人信仰

original: With the [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] following a heretic faith we have had to make concessions for other who have strayed from the official path of our [Root.GovernmentName].
translation: 当 [Root.Monarch.GetTitle] [Root.Monarch.GetHerselfHimself] 坚持他的异端信仰，我们不得不对偏离[Root.GovernmentName]官方宗教教义的人作出让步

original: The [Root.GetAreaName] area has seen a sharp increase in religious unrest and violence related to the the open patronization of a heathen faith in the country's capital.
translation: 由于首都的异教徒信仰受到庇护， [Root.GetAreaName]地区的宗教骚乱和暴力冲突显著恶化。

original: Our ruler has utilized close ties with the countries with which [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] cultural affinity.
translation: 我们的统治者利用了与我国文化 [Root.Monarch.GetSheHe] 有渊源的国家的亲密关系

original: Due to the rapid rise of a few forward individuals from this community to high position in government their area is now very supportive of the state.
translation: 由于一部分来自该地区的进步人士在政府中迅速身居高位，该地区民众十分支持政府

original: We have been blessed by the cooperation of a versatile local powerholder in this region. As a loyal subject of the state he is doing great work for us.
translation: 我们有幸得到一个才能出色的本地有力人物的合作。他作为一个忠诚的臣民为我们作出了巨大的贡献

original: By seizing control over the Island of Hormuz we have managed to secure a base from which we can control the trade of the Persian Gulf.
translation: 通过占领霍尔木兹岛我们将确保可以稳定控制波斯湾的贸易

original: We have seized control of the Batinah and the Omani coastline towards the Persian gulf. Finally ensuring that the Omani trade cities are under Omani control and establishing our [Root.GovernmentName] as the leader of all Omanis.
translation: 我们控制了巴提奈和伸向波斯湾的阿曼海岸。最终保证阿曼贸易城市群处于阿曼的保护之下，并以此确立我们的 [Root.GovernmentName] 在全阿曼的统治地位

original: It is the destiny of Oman to rule the Arabian sea, to control its trade and to dominate its sea lanes.
translation: 支配阿拉伯海是阿曼的天命所在，去统治她的贸易和航线吧

original: Our recent establishment of a new colony has vitalized our economy.
translation: 我们最近建成的殖民地刺激了我们的经济

original: Our government is paralyzed by factionalism and infighting between the powerful Mamluk households.
translation: 我们的政府因实力强大的马穆鲁克贵族间的党政和内讧而瘫痪

original: Local powerholders have seized control over all government functions and paralyzed our state.
translation: 当地实权派控制了全部政府职能并且瘫痪了我们的国家

original: We have reclaimed part of Salladins Legacy, restoring the lands that our dynasty once lost.
translation: 我们重现了萨拉丁传奇的一部分，夺回了一度属于我们王朝的领土。

original: The eternal living Guru inspires us to defend our faith and our countrymen.
translation: 永世长存的圣典激励着我们保卫我们的信仰和同胞。

original: The eternal living Guru continues to inspire and guide generations in the ways of Sikhism.
translation: 永世长存的圣典激励并指导我们世世代代走在锡克教的正道上。

original: We must not abide the heretics in our realm. A harsh set of laws designed to target any followers of the traditions of false Imams and priests has allowed us to marginalize any heretical influence within our society.
translation: 在我们的王国里，我们决不能容忍异教徒的存在。一套针对那些追随异教伊玛目和阿訇的信徒的严厉法律，允许我们排斥社会上一切异教徒势力。

original: Jingdezhen's history as a major kiln site goes back to 1004. By the 14th century was the largest centre for production of porcelain in China and the center of the vast majority of all exported Imperial Porcelain throughout the period.
translation: 景德镇作为主要窑址的历史可以追溯到1004年。到了14世纪，这里已成为中国最大的瓷器生产中心和该时期绝大多数官窑瓷器的出口中心。

original: This province is slowly recovering from the effect of a giant Tsunami wave that washed away houses, castles and roads alike.
translation: 这个省正在缓慢地从一场巨大的冲击了房屋、城堡和道路的海啸浪潮中恢复过来。

original: We are spending great resources to build a new, safer and more efficient city here after the great Meireki fire burnt the existing settlement to the ground.
translation: 在明历大火烧毁了现有的定居点之后，我们花费了大量的资源在这里建造一座崭新且更加安全和高效的城市。

original: We are spending great resources on helping everyone who lost their homes in the great Meireki fire to rebuild and create new lives within the new city.
translation: 我们正花费大量的资源，帮助那些在明历大火中失去家园的人们重建城市并开始新生活。

original: This province is slowly recovering from the effects of the eruption of Mount Fuji. While the eruption did not cause much direct damage in the forms of lava or rocks it has covered fields in ashes and cinders and caused severe flooding through the silting of the local rivers.
translation: 这个省正在慢慢从富士山爆发的影响中恢复过来。 虽然火山爆发并没有以熔岩或岩石的形式造成太多的直接破坏，但灰烬和浮渣覆盖了土地，并且通过当地河流的淤积造成了严重的洪水。

original: Over time the tale of the forty-seven ronin and their quest to avenge their master has grown to be a popular legend. Inspiring generations of warriors in our realm.
translation: 随着时间的流逝，四十七个浪人的故事和他们为主人复仇的行为已经成为一个广为流传的传奇。 在我们的王国中鼓舞了一代勇士。

original: The story of the forty-seven Ronin and their quest to avenge their master, determined to not let anything stop them, is inspiring resistance to the vital changes we are undertaking to shape Japanese society.
translation: 四十七个浪人的故事和他们为主人复仇的行为、不为任何事情所阻挡的决心，激起了对我们为塑造日本社会所做的重大变革的抵抗。

original: We have turned Yamaguchi into the greatest city of Western Japan. A sprawling capital not only of our Clan but of all influential nobles in this region.
translation: 我们把山口变成了日本西部最大的城市。这座不断扩张的城市不仅仅属于我们家族也属于这个地区所有有影响力的贵族。

original: We have given the Merchants of this city the right to rule themselves, enabling the city and its influence to grow under our protection.
translation: 我们给与了商人在这座城市中自治的权力，授权这座城市和它的影响力在我们的保护下增长。

original: This province is home to the impressive Azuchi castle. Built to serve as a model for the entire realm with its high stone walls and firearms-oriented design.
translation: 这个省是令人印象深刻的安土城的所在地。安土城以它高耸的石墙和枪械导向的设计作为整个王国的模范被建造起来。

original: Our efforts to strengthen the army has resulted in a big upswing for our domestic arms producers.
translation: 我们在军事方面的努力致使我国国内军工产业的大幅度提升

original: Through our expansive policies the importance of this area as the capital and core of our country has resulted in a great influx of people, investments and business opportunities.
translation: 在推行扩张政策之后，我国首都地区的发展越来越引人重视，大量的劳动力涌入，进而推动了商业的发展。

original: Our rapid integration of new lands have brought us both respect and valuably lessons in rulership.
translation: 新领地的快速整合为我们带来了大量威望与利益。

original: Our willingness to invest in the creation of standing armies have lead to a wave of enthusiasm for the army. Many are seeking army careers both among commoners and the more well to do and our recruiters now have the luxury of choice where they might in the past have had to accept whoever was interested.
translation: 我们对于创造一支常备军的投资意愿已经带来了一股对于参队的热情。许多普通百姓和更高阶层的人都对军旅生活充满向往。我们的征兵官员现在有着令人眼花缭乱的丰富人选，他们过去往往必须得接受所有意向参加的人才能满足征兵要求。

original: Our territorial expansion and unquestioned leadership of our home region has lead to an increasing international respect and internal cohesion.
translation: 领土的扩张与统治者英明的领导使我国获得了国际上的尊重和国内凝聚力的提高。

original: Our fostering of close relationships with our allies have borne fruit in the form of a greater respect for us internationally.
translation: 我们与盟国之间的密切互动终于开花结果，为我们在国际上赢得了不少尊重。

original: Over time the ruling classes of our subjects have come to realize the greatness of our court. They have been given honors and ranks in our rolls of nobility and are eager to accept our more direct rule.
translation: 通过对附庸阶级的长期统治，使他们逐渐领略到了我们王室的崇高。他们被赐予荣誉及贵族头衔，同时他们也渴望被我们进一步直接统治。

original: Our efforts to strengthen the navy have created a widespread enthusiasm for it in our country with more people wanting to join as both officers and sailors.
translation: 我们增强海军的努力在国内引起了广泛的热情，越来越多的人希望加入到海军军官和水手的行列。

original: This province has come to grow into a dominant trade hub through the great influence that its merchants have acquired in the entire region.
translation: 通过当地商人在整个地区的巨大影响力，该省已经成长为这一地区的贸易中枢。

original: Our policy of supporting the trade with Asia through conquests of important ports has opened up that market to us in an unprecedented way. The rush to establish new trade links with Asia has led to a boom in many sectors of our economy.
translation: 我们通过征服重要港口来支持与亚洲贸易的政策，以前所未有的方式向打开了这个市场。与亚洲建立新的贸易联系的狂潮导致许多经济部门蓬勃发展。

original: Our efforts to increase the government incomes have created synergic effects where we can get more out of our investments when we choose to make them.
translation: 我们增加政府收入的努力已经产生了一种协同效应，随着我们对其进行更多的投资我们能够获得更多的收益

original: Our investment in infrastructure is bringing great, and immediate, economic benefits to the state.
translation: 我们对基础设施的投资为国家带来了巨大而直接的经济效益。

original: Our proven willingness to commit to long term economic policies to strengthen the central treasury has borne fruit. Our central bank is now respected and its economic policies increasingly efficient.
translation: 我们已经证明了致力于长期经济政策以加强中央财政的意愿已经取得了成果。我们的中央银行现在受到尊重，其经济政策也越来越有效率。

original: Rapid expansion of more modern means of production and entrepreneurial activities have stimulated an overall increase in productivity and economic prosperity in our country.
translation: 现代化生产资料的发展和创业活动的繁荣，使我国生产力和经济得到全面增长。

original: Our growing state is increasingly being recognized as one of the true empires of this world and in some ways this has made conquered peoples more willing to accept our rule. Life under the umbrella of a true hegemon like us is not necessarily worse than it would have been under the local power that they once knew.
translation: 我国已被越来越多的国家认为是这个世界真正的列强。某些方面上，被征服地区的人民更愿意接受我们的统治。在像我们这样的真正霸主的保护下生活，并不比以前差。

original: The contentious lands of Silesia often sought protection from our neighbor, Bohemia. With Bohemia out of the way, they shall prosper under our rule.
translation: 存在领土争议的西里西亚经常从我们的邻居——波西米亚那里寻求保护。随着波西米亚的退出，我们在西里西亚的统治必将成功。

original: Successful bid for the Imperial Crown
Having finally acquired the Imperial title we have moved to further strengthen our hold over the electors.
translation: 获得皇帝头衔后，我们对选帝侯们的掌控进一步加深了。

original: One of the most prestigious titles in the Empire, Bohemia, is now part of the inherited domain of our family. While the Bohemian estates are generally not as easily coerced as the Austrian ones this is a major asset in Imperial politics.
translation: 作为帝国最负盛名的头衔之一，波西米亚现在是我们家族继承的一部分。虽然波西米亚的遗产通常不像奥地利的那样容易被支配，但它已经是帝国政治的主要资产了。

original: Our expansion outside of our ancestral lands and the Holy Roman Empire has established our position as a great power in the eyes of the world and an Empire in our own right.
translation: 我们在祖先土地和神圣罗马帝国之外的扩张已经确立了我们在世界眼中的大国地位和我们自己的权利。

original: We have acquired the crown of Hungary, offering them a safe alternative to Turkish rule. The Hungarian people are now flocking to our banners, along with minorities such as wlachs and germans who are also fleeing Ottoman Expansion in the Balkans.
translation: 我们已经获得了匈牙利的王冠，为他们提供了土耳其统治的安全替代方案。现在匈牙利的人民，以及巴尔干地区其他试图摆脱奥斯曼帝国扩张的少数民族，如瓦拉几亚人和日耳曼人，都纷纷倒向我们的旗帜。

original: Through our efforts the once splintered domains of Austria have been reunited.
translation: 通过我们的不懈努力，曾经分裂的奥地利地区重新归于统一。

original: With the fall of Belgrade the route into Europe now lies open. From Vienna to Stockholm priests are rallying their populations against the new threat. Meanwhile we have made clear to the world that we are the new dominant power in the Balkans, those who wish to overthrow the old order are now eager to seek our employment.
translation: 随着贝尔格莱德的陷落，进入欧洲的门户洞开了。从维也纳到斯德哥尔摩的牧师正在纠结他们的民众抵抗新的威胁。与此同时，我们向世界表明，我们是巴尔干地区新的主宰者，那些想推翻旧秩序的人现在迫切想要投入我们门下。

original: Our control over most of the river Danube allows us to transport goods and supplies more efficiently to armies throughout the Carpathian region.
translation: 我们已经控制了多瑙河沿岸的大部分土地，这使我们能够更有效地将物资和补给运送给整个喀尔巴阡地区的军队。

original: With the Principality of Transylvania under our control we are the masters of Eastern Hungary and the Carpathian mountains. The Transylvanian principality and its estates however have been allowed a great deal of freedom in exchange for their loyalty and their supply of raw materials such as salt and gold.
translation: 随着对特兰西瓦尼亚公国的征服，我们已经成为喀尔巴千以西、匈牙利以东的主人。同时我们与特兰西瓦尼亚的领主们达成了一份自由宪章，以换取他们的忠诚及食盐、黄金等原料的供应。

original: Through our acquisition of Greek provinces we have gained access to a great number of experienced sailors and great ports, an excellent start to a naval empire.
translation: 通过吞并希腊各省，我们获得了一大批经验丰富的水手和良港，这将是我们成为海军强国的第一步。

original: Defeating the Knights of Rhodes have handed over naval superiority in the eastern mediterranean entirely to our fleets.
translation: 击败罗得岛的骑士们后，我们的舰队已经完全取得了东地中海的制海权。

original: Consolidation of the Eyalet of Anatolia
translation: 合并埃及的安纳托利亚省

original: By unifying the disparate Beyliks of Anatolia under our rule we have created a strong power base for future expansion into the Caucasus and the Levant.
translation: 由于对分裂的土耳其区域的统一，整个安纳托利亚都已经处在我们统治之下，这为我们对高加索以及黎凡特地区的进一步扩张奠定了坚实基础。

original: Our naval bases in the Maghreb have allowed us to support a great number of corsairs and pirates that are a constant nuisance to other Mediterranean powers.
translation: 我们在马格里布的海军基地允许我们去支持数量庞大的海盗舰队，这将是地中海其他列强的永恒梦魇！

original: By conquering the greater Syrian region we have secured the holy city of Jerusalem along with the major trade routes in northern Syria. This is stimulating our economy greatly and allows us to control the flow of Iranian silk from the east.
translation: 通过征服大叙利亚地区，我们获得了圣城耶路撒冷以及叙利亚北部的主要贸易路线。 这大大刺激了我们的经济，使我们能够控制伊朗丝绸从东方流入。

original: Consolidating all of the Russian realms into a single empire is a monumental task, but one which is aided greatly by our capable administration.
translation: 把全俄罗斯地区整合成一个帝国是一项艰巨的任务，但我们高效的行政部门绝对可以胜任此事。

original: The Belarusian and Ruthenian peoples have much in common with us Russians. Integrating their lands into our empire is proving relatively simple.
translation: 波洛茨克和鲁塞尼亚人与我们俄罗斯人有许多共同点。将他们的土地合并进我们的帝国相比较而言是简单的。

original: The nomadic peoples of the Stepps must be converted to our faith.
translation: 草原上的游牧民族必须皈依我们的信仰。

original: By forcibly taking control over the ports of the Baltic we have secured a competitive edge for our traders. At least for the time being.
translation: 通过强行控制波罗的海港，我们为国内的商人们提供了暂时的竞争优势。

original: Conquering Finland was difficult but we have learned lessons about attrition from the conflict.
translation: 征服芬兰是困难的，但是我们从冲突中学到了损耗的教训。

original: We have a port on the Pacific Ocean that can help us construct a new fleet.
translation: 我们在太平洋的港口将有助于我们建立新的舰队。

original: Our trappers are exploiting new sources of fur throughout Siberia
translation: 我们的前哨战正在遥远的西伯利亚开疆扩土

original: We should make the integration of the Duchy of Mazovia a priority for our nation. Our diplomats are working to make this process as efficient as possible.
translation: 我们应该制造吞并摩拉维亚公国的优先权。我们的外交官正在尽可能使这一进程更为有效率而努力。

original: The Union of Poland and Lithuania
Poland and Lithuania are at last united as a single realm. The integration efforts are aided by the close relationship of our nations in the past.
translation: 波兰和立陶宛最终联合为一个单独的国家，这完全取决于我们两国间的过去的亲密关系

original: At last the upstart Teutonic Knights have fully accepted Polish dominion.
translation: 最终，新崛起的条顿骑士团完全接受了波兰统治。

original: The realm of Silesia is now ours. Once ruled by the Piast dynasty, it once again falls under Polish dominion.
translation: 西里西亚的王国现在是我们的。 它曾被皮亚斯特王朝统治，现在它又一次归入波兰统治之下。

original: The strengthening of the Orthodox church in lands reclaimed from the Ottomans have led to large swing towards Greek Orthodoxy among the populations under our control.
translation: 在奥斯曼帝国控制的土地上，东正教教堂的影响力逐渐增强，这导致我们的人民对希腊东正教的立场开始动摇。

original: The reconquest of Southern Italy by Roman troops is a major victory for the Empire and has led to widespread enthusiasm for the revival of the Roman Empire in Italy. Tired of the many petty wars of renaissance princes the Italian people long for a true rebirth of the Empire and for the recreation of Roman Peace.
translation: 罗马军队重新征服南意大利是帝国的一次重大胜利，使得罗马帝国复兴的热情传遍了意大利。意大利人民厌倦了文艺复兴领主们无休止的小规模战争，他们渴望帝国的真正重生和罗马和平的重建。

original: Sicily has been called the breadbasket of the Empire and its conquest is a major boon both for the city of Constantinople itself and for our navies in the Mediterranean.
translation: 西西里岛曾是帝国的重要粮仓，它的征服无论对君士坦丁堡还是我们的地中海舰队来说，都是一大幸事。

original: Restoring the Pentarchy have brought the Orthodox church back to being a dominant force within the greater Christian movement. All over the Empire the faithful are rejoicing as we restore the empire that was once lost.
translation: 五大牧首区的恢复使东正教成为基督教的真正正统。 看到帝国重拾旧日的辉煌，国民无不欢欣鼓舞。

original: The people of Rome once again follow the Orthodox faith, the few die-hard Papists that remain are in hiding. While this certainly doesn't end the Great Schism, if anything it deepens it, it certainly gives the Eastern Orthodox Church an advantage the eternal battle for religious authority.
translation: 罗马的人民已经重新回归了正统信仰，只有少数顽固的教宗追随者仍躲藏在暗处。虽然这的确不能结束“大分裂”，但可以确信的是，它将为之后处在长期宗教权威论战中的东方正教会提供优势。

original: By reconquering Italy we have managed to restore the core of the original Roman Empire and have shown the world that we are the true heirs of the Roman legacy.\nThe Byzantine Phoenix has risen from the ashes.
translation: 通过对意大利的再征服，我们已经设法恢复了罗马帝国起源的核心地区，也进一步彰显了我们才是罗马遗产的真正继承者。\n拜占庭紫凤已经涅槃重生！

original: By crushing the Republic of Venice and taking their lands as our own we have finally avenged their shameful betrayal and redeemed ourselves in the eyes of the world and our own citizens. From high to low this inspiring victory is mobilizing the masses to our cause.
translation: 威尼斯共和国摧毁了，他们的土地被我们占为己有，我们终于向他们可耻的背叛报了仇，并在全世界和我们公民的面前挽回了尊严。这个鼓舞人心的胜利自上而下地动员群众参与我们的事业。

original: Centuries of warfare has left the Balkans with a great number of very experienced soldiers. As we reincorporate the Balkan provinces into the Empire we can tap this resource and see our ranks grow with already battle-hardened recruits.
translation: 数百年不息的战争使巴尔干士兵都身经百战。如今我们重新将巴尔干省份纳入帝国统治，这些老兵也将化为帝国重要的战力，将他们编入军队，带领我们的新兵在战斗中成长。

original: The pillaging and destruction suffered by the city of Venice as it came under Byzantine control has left a lasting mark upon it.
translation: 拜占庭治下的威尼斯曾经遭受过掠夺和破坏，这些苦难的历史给这座城市留下了不可磨灭的印记。

original: The return of treasures once looted by the crusaders is a great boon to the growth of our Imperial capital.
translation: 曾经被十字军抢劫过的宝物现在回归了祖国的怀抱，这对帝国首都的发展大有益处。

original: The Swedish state has achieved its natural southern borders.
translation: 瑞典已经恢复了他南边的自然边界

original: Norway has been seized by the Swedish state, wrested from the grasp of the Danish kings.
translation: 挪威地区不再属于丹麦国王了，她已经被瑞典所征服。

original: Sweden now has a foothold on the southern Baltic. From here it may be possible to expand further into Germany.
translation: 瑞典取得了在南波罗的海的立足点， 这里可以成为我们向德国扩张的跳板。

original: Denmark and Norway are now inseparable nations, ruled by one king and administered by one government.
translation: 丹麦和挪威合并成为不可分割的一个国家，由一个国王统治，由一个政府管理。

original: The three crowns of Denmark, Norway, and Sweden are now one. All Scandinavia is united under our rule.
translation: 丹麦，挪威和瑞典的三顶王冠融为一体，所有斯堪的纳维亚人都统一在我们的统治之下。

original: Naval Combat Bonus off owned coast

Prussia's conquest of the northern Rhineland confers a sort of legitimacy for further expansion. While our claims are no stronger in themselves, other nations will see our growth as simply expected from here on.
translation: 普鲁士对于北莱茵兰的征服为之后进一步扩张提供了一种合法性。虽然我们在这些地区的宣称并不是十分站得住脚，但是从此刻起，我们的成长将会是其他国家不得不接受的事实。

original: Despite the wariness of the locals, newfound access to the European markets results in increased prosperity for all parties.
translation: 尽管当地人很谨慎，但进入欧洲市场的新途径让各方都更加繁荣。

original: Tales of fertile, undiscovered land, are rife on the streets of [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]. It should be no trouble at all to find men and women to set foot there in the name of [Root.GetName].
translation: 在[Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]的街头巷尾盛传存在着肥沃而未被开发的土地的传言。找一些人以[Root.GetName]的名义登上那片土地应当是十分容易的。

original: With the recent success of [Root.GetName]'s colonial ventures, the public appetite for the new and exotic is on the rise. It is an appetite that we must satisfy.
translation: 随着[Root.GetName]的殖民事业的成功，大众对新奇的异国事物的欲望正蓬勃高涨。我们必须满足他们的这种欲望。

original: Our mastery of the sea in this area guarantees that most, if not all profits are directed firmly towards [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName].
translation: 我们对于这片海域的控制权是至关重要的，它确保了所有的收益都直接稳固的流向  [Root.Capital.GetCapitalName]。

original: Repeated Atlantic crossings, fraught with storms, piracy and starvation, have tempered the crews fortunate enough to survive. The seamanship of our navy is second to none.
translation: 往返穿越大西洋充满了风暴、海盗和饥荒，船员足够幸运得以存活下来。我们海军的航海技能是首屈一指的。

original: The hereditary estates established by the revered Captains have spurred economic growth, and significant exploratory gains. It is time we asked them for something in return.
translation: 受尊敬的船长们确立的世袭地位促进了经济的增长，并取得了显著的探索收益。现在该是我们向他们要求回报的时候了。

original: The European desire for spices, cured meats, and exotic fabrics make our influence in these regions very potent indeed.
translation: 欧洲对香料、腌肉和异国织物的渴望令我们在这些地区的影响力十分强大。

original: Our influence has grown so strongly in this region, that are able to practically dictate terms to all who do business downstream.
translation: 我们在这块地区的影响了急剧上升，以至于我们能任意摆布在下游做生意的人

original: Our people may rest secure in the knowledge that they are pioneers, all. The legacy of the Navigator lives on.
translation: 我们可以安全的在祖先留下的这片土地休养生息，靠着他们留下来的遗产。

original: We have extended our control to the very limits of Africa. Now we reap the rewards.
translation: 我们已经将自己的统治扩展到了整个非洲。现在是时候获得回报了。

original: Our dominance of coastal islands around Africa gives us a significant tactical advantage.
translation: 我们在非洲沿海岛屿的统治为我们带来重大的战术优势。

original: The occupation of this province by western forces has had a lasting impact on its geography.
translation: 被西方军队占领这个省份对这个省产生了深远的影响。

original: The inhabitants of Ireland may resent their English overlords, but they certainly know how to work hard.
translation: 爱尔兰人民可能会怨恨他们的英国领主，但是他们肯定知道怎么努力工作。

original: The Gaelic pagans will subvert our way of life if we let them. Better to let them think they have equal status.
translation: 如果我们继续纵容盖尔人，这些异教徒将颠覆我们的生活方式。最好让他们明白他们与我们有平等的地位。

original: Now that we have triumphed over the Duchy of France, we have offered the defeated French soldiery the opportunity to fight for us. Any wage is better than none.
translation: 现在我们已经战胜了法国的公国，我们向战败的法国士兵提供了为我们战斗的机会。有工资总比没有好。
一个实用（有益）的劳动力

original: Violent natives may make troublesome opponents, but they make excellent slaves.
translation: 粗暴的原住民可能会制造一些麻烦，不过他们也能成为优秀的奴隶。

original: Even just a small tax can line one's pockets.
translation: 即使只是一小笔税，也可以放在口袋里。

original: While much of the continent is inhospitable, the luscious coastal regions provide a safe haven for the adventurous. News of our landfall here will spread quickly.
translation: 尽管大陆大部分地区荒凉，但富饶的沿海地区为冒险者提供了安全的避风港。我们登陆的消息将迅速传开。

original: The vessels of our Merchant Navy are often better equipped than those of our fleet. Needless to say, they protect their interests well.
translation: 我们的商船通常比我们的舰队装备得更好。不用说，他们可以很好地保护自己的利益。

original: The coast of Brittany is pockmarked with small natural caves, harbors, and places to hide ships and their cargo. There is no better place to avoid tariffs!
translation: 坑坑洼洼的布列塔尼海岸是隐藏货物及船舶的天然洞穴和海港。不会再有比这更好的避税之地了！

original: Our captains know well the value of knowledge. Charts of values, inflation, prices and durations are their stock and trade; a small saving can make a fortune when ruthlessly exploited.
translation: 我们的船长们非常了解知识的价值。他们用图表记下商品的价值，通货膨胀，价格和周期，这是他们的生意经。只要加以充分利用，一点微小的投资也能变成一笔巨款。

original: The territory of Gibraltar makes a splendid Naval resupply base for our Mediterranean operations.
translation: 直布罗陀给我们在地中海的行动提供了一个很好的海军基地。

original: Well placed ports make traversing the reaches of the North Channel much less hazardous.
translation: 位置优越的港口能降低北海峡的危险性。

original: With the inhabitants of the colonies firmly under one administration, we can be sure of their continued support.
translation: 随着殖民地居民坚定地在一个政府之下，我们坚信他们的会支持的。

original: Let it be known that we have taken a stand against heresy.
translation: 让他们知道，我们已经站在反对异端邪说的立场上了。

original: We weren't expecting the New World to be quite so... cold. Nonetheless, if we can survive here, we can survive anywhere.
translation: 我们没想到新大陆会这么冷。尽管如此，如果我们能在这里生存下去，我们就能在任何地方生存。

original: Tediously careful analysis of routes, tides and weather has allowed our merchant Captains to shave quite the portion off their journeys to and from the New World.
translation: 对航线、潮汐和天气状况的仔细分析使我们的商船船长能够削减相当一部分往返于新大陆的航程。

original: We have proven that our Royal line may never again be challenged.
translation: 我们已经证明了我们的皇室家族可能再也不会受到挑战了。

original: Nobles and their wives lounge under ornate parasols, enjoying fine wines, as matters of State are discussed. Angers has been reinvigorated by this economic windfall.
translation: 贵族和贵妇们休憩在华丽的遮阳伞下，享受着美酒，谈论着国事。 这一暴利活动重振了他们的热情。

original: Whether our diplomats bring declarations of war, offers of peace, or simple platitudes, people are always glad to see them.
translation: 无论我们的外交官们带来宣战书，议和谈判，还是简单的陈词滥调，人们总是很高兴看到他们。

original: It is most important to know when to give, and when to take away.
translation: 最重要的是知道何时给予，何时剥夺。

original: Universities have been present in Oxford and Cambridge for centuries. Renewed facilities have given them a chance to spread their wisdom.
translation: 几世纪前牛津和剑桥已经出现了大学，更新之后的设施让这些大学有更好的机会去传播他们都知识与智慧

original: Our skill in administrating from afar has paid off.
translation: 我们管理遥远土地的技巧获得了回报。

original: Many of the inhabitants of these domains are simply overjoyed to learn of our superior [Root.Owner.GetAdjective] ways.
translation: 许多这些领域的居民乐于学习我们优越的 [Root.GetAdjective] 方式.

original: We don't claim to understand their heathen religion, but the Indian soldiery certainly know how to fight.
translation: 虽然我们不能自称熟悉印度士兵信仰的异教，但是他们肯定知道如何作战。

original: All trade from the East flows through the Nile Delta. He who controls the Delta, reaps the profits.
translation: 尼罗河三角洲是东方贸易的必经之地。谁控制了三角洲，谁就能从中渔利。

original: This steam engine, invented by Misters Boulton and Watt has revolutionized mineral extraction. Fueled by coal, it has had a splendid effect on our mining industry.
translation: 博尔顿和瓦特发明的蒸汽机彻底改变了矿石的提炼，它以煤为燃料，对我国矿业产生了巨大的影响。

original: It is not enough to simply be an Emperor, one must wield the very authority of an Emperor
translation: 光被叫做皇帝还远远不够，皇帝还得施展自己无上的权威。

original: By delegating administration of the day-to-day tasks in these areas to the British East India Company, their innate knowledge of local custom and exploitable resources will keep things ticking along perfectly.
translation: 通过将这些地区的日常工作委派给英国东印度公司，他们对当地习俗和可利用资源的与生俱来的知识将使事情进展变得顺利。

original: A centralized justice system administers the law to all Scots.
translation: 中央集权的司法系统，管理着苏格兰全国的法律。

original: Schools are being set up in every parish and landowners are required to have a basic education.
translation: 每个教区都建立了学校，地主们要求享受基础教育。

original: We have emerged from the Reformation as a religiously harmonious nation.
translation: 我国已经摆脱宗教改革达成宗教和谐。

original: The Bank of Scotland is investing in local business initiatives.
translation: 苏格兰银行正在投资当地的商业活动。

original: Our coal fields in this region are being exploited to their full potential.
translation: 我们这个地区的煤田获得了充分的利用。

original: We rule all the British Isles. Scotland has taken its place on the world stage.
translation: 我们统治了不列颠群岛。苏格兰在世界舞台上占据了一席之地。

original: Ireland is ours. Its conquest was bloody but our armies are enthused.
translation: 爱尔兰是我们的了。其征服虽然血腥，但是我们的军队却热情洋溢。

original: We have dominated trade in the North Sea, and are enjoying the benefits.
translation: 我们已经主宰了北海的贸易，并且从中获利。

original: A New Scotland is flourishing in the New World.
translation: 新苏格兰在新大陆蓬勃发展。

original: The fishing industry in the north Atlantic islands is experiencing a boom under our rule.
translation: 在我们的统治下，北大西洋诸岛的捕鱼业飞速发展。

original: The Highland clans are now firmly obedient to the crown. They will raise armies to fight for our nation.
translation: 高地氏族现在坚定地服从国王。他们将召集军队为我们的国家而战。

original: Many of London's old institutions are being relocated to Edinburgh. Our capital is growing rapidly and will soon be counted among the world's greatest cities.
translation: 许多伦敦的故有建制正在被重新安置于爱丁堡。我们的首都将会迅速发展，并很快位列世界大都市之林。
伊斯帕尼奥拉岛在等待

original: There may yet be truth to the tale the India lies within our reach. This land we have discovered, however, is truly wondrous to behold. Perhaps there are those amongst our populace who would venture to make this their home?
translation: 这个故事也许还真实，印度在我们所能触及的范围内。然而，我们发现的这块土地确实令人惊叹。也许在我们的民众中，有谁敢冒险把这变成他们的家？

original: Our planned reconquest of the Iberian peninsula is no secret to our troops.
translation: 我们收复伊比利亚半岛的计划对于军队而言并不是机密。

original: With the Incan leaders executed, their temples looted, and their people scattered, there is no need for us to integrate them gently.
translation: 随着皇帝被屠戮、庙宇被劫掠、人民遭颠沛，温和的吞并印加帝国已纯属多此一举。

original: The Inca simply couldn't mine gold as well as our advanced technology allows. There is plenty left to extract, and hundreds of willing volunteers to gather it.
translation: 印加人不像拥有先进技术的我们一样可以轻易地开采金矿。如今我们有成百上千的人愿意去收集这些富饶的资源。

original: Order is restored to Iberia, Christians everywhere rejoice!
translation: 伊比利亚恢复秩序，基督徒处处欢庆！

original: We now have ample ports in which to base our ever-growing Mediterranean fleet. We can also employ the skills of the Neapolitan master ship-builders, who now work for us.
translation: 我们现在有足够的港口来建立我们日益增长的地中海舰队。我们还可以运用现在为我们工作的那不勒斯造船大师的技术。

original: The Intendant system promotes excellent revenue from the colonies.
translation: 这个管理系统从各殖民地攫取了丰厚的收益。

original: The establishment of the East and West Trading Companies has revitalised the Dutch sphere of influence. Support for the colonies has never been stronger.
translation: 东西贸易公司的建立重新恢复了荷兰地区的影响力。对于殖民地的支持从来没有这么强大过。

original: The more ports we have on the spice-routes, the better.
translation: 我们在香料之路上的港口越多越好。

original: We have control over the important trade city of Malacca and the surrounding regions.
translation: 我们控制着马六甲及其周边地区的重要贸易城市。

original: A foreboding redoubt of hewn stone and Dutch architecture, Fort Zeelandia stands proud over the isle of Formosa.
translation: 由荷兰式建筑与毛石组成的预警线，泽兰堡垒，骄傲地伫立在福尔摩沙岛的顶端。

original: The repatriation of our brethren has bolstered the morale of our armies considerably.
translation: 我们弟兄们的遣返大大地加强了我们军队的士气。

original: The foundation of Ireland's first university is opening up new avenues in scholarly learning.
translation: 第一所大学的建立为爱尔兰的学术研究开辟了新的途径。

original: The Irish people are flocking to the New World in great numbers, seeking opportunity and profit.
translation: 大量爱尔兰人结队前往新大陆，追寻机会和利益

original: For the first time in generations, Ireland has a High King worthy of the title.
translation: 数代人后，爱尔兰迎来了一位名副其实的至高王

original: Irish armies are venturing forth beyond the Pale, ready to take the fight to our English oppressors.
translation: 天边正泛起鱼肚白，爱尔兰的军队就开始推进，准备向我们英国的镇压部队进攻。

original: Many clans of the Highlands and Western Isles trace their root back to Ireland. They are being brought into the fold.
translation: 许多高地及西爱尔兰地区的部族都将他们的族源追溯到了爱尔兰。他们被带回了家乡。

original: The import of potatoes is a great boon for Ireland. Easy to plant and grow, a family can easily subsist on these tubers throughout the year.
translation: 土豆的进口是对爱尔兰的恩赐。它易于种植和生长，一个家庭可以轻松的依靠它度过一整年。

original: Having discovered a sea route to India, we should make haste to those shores and establish a colony there.
translation: 已经发现了一条通往印度的海路，我们应该赶快到那些海岸并在那里建立一个殖民地。

original: Calais is in French hands. It is a thriving trade port that we can once again exploit.
translation: 加莱在法国手中。这是一个我们可以再次利用的繁荣的贸易港口。

original: We have established colonies in the New World, and must ensure that they pay their dues to France.
translation: 我们已经在新大陆建立了殖民地，并且必须确保他们向法兰西缴纳税费。

original: The German Princes are right to fear French incursions into Germany. In time they will accept us as their rightful overlords.
translation: 德意志诸侯们正陷入对法国入侵德意志地区的恐惧之中。迟早他们会接受我们作为他们的合法领主。

original: Our forces are ready, now is the time to strike!
translation: 我们的部队已经集结完毕，现在正是准备战斗的时候！

original: Now that we have reclaimed our coast, we can focus on the acquisition of wealth.
translation: 我们已经收回了我们的海岸，现在我们可以专注于积累财富了。

original: The ancient era of the Three Kingdoms is long since past, but we have reunited their territory and restored Korea to its former glory.
translation: 遥远的的三国并立局面已经成为过去，我们已经重新联合了他们的领土并且重现了高丽昔日的荣光。

original: We now control many of the important shipping ports along the Indian coast. There are few to challenge our right to impose lucrative tariffs on visiting merchants.
translation: 我们现在控制了印度沿海许多重要的航运港。很少有人质疑我们对来访商人征收丰厚关税的权利。

original: We now own the famed Golconda diamond mines. It is surprising how much more receptive foreign diplomats can be when faced with such opulence.
translation: 我们现在拥有著名的高康达钻石矿。对于一个外国外交人员来说，面的这般富裕，是多么的令人难以想象。

original: As one of the more important cities of Persian Khorasan, Herat is home to the governor of the region and the center of our operations in the East.
translation: 作为波斯呼罗珊最重要的城市之一，哈烈是该地区总督的所在地，也是我们东部的交易中心。

original: Having secured control of the old heartland of the Ilkhanate we have good access to the the tribal warriors that once served it and its successor states.
translation: 通过伊利汗国旧有心脏地带的绝对控制，我们获得了进入部落勇士曾经效力过的、其继承者们领地的途径。

original: The conquest of Afghanistan has opened up for the recruitment of the warriors of the Pashtun clans into our ranks. Expecting to be allowed to plunder the Indian plains many are eager to join our cause.
translation: 对于阿富汗的征服，为我们招募普什图族勇士加入我们的队列打开了大门。期待被允许去掠夺印度平原，在很大程度上也成为了他们渴望加入我们的一个缘由。

original: Built by the ancient Solanki Kings, and further built upon by countless overlords, the fortress at Champaner is widely known to be impregnable. We have proven that rumour false, so we must renovate and improve the walls.
translation: 由古老的索兰基国王建造，并由无数的领主进一步修建的位于尚庞的堡垒被人们认为坚不可摧。我们已经证明这个传言并不正确，所以我们必须翻新和加固城墙。

original: Our troops have learned valuable lessons in the treacherous mountain terrain.
translation: 危险的山地给我们的部队上了富有价值的课程

original: A centralized administration will benefit us all.
translation: 中央集权的统治将给我们所有人带来好处

original: The cavalry charge is where our riders excel.
Ming's capital has fallen to us. We must press onward into China!
translation: 大明的首都已经落入我手。我们应该继续在中国进军！

original: Farmers and merchants have regained trust in our currency.
translation: 农民跟商人重新拾起对我们货币的信心

original: Our family are patrons of the art of Kabuki.
translation: 我们家族是歌舞伎艺术的赞助者

original: Our cherry blossoms are the envy of Japan
translation: 全日本艳羡我们盛放的樱花

original: By setting up a well funded circle of Shinobi of our own we are protecting family, clan and Han.
translation: 通过资助我们自己的忍者里，我们可以更好地保护家庭，氏族和藩国

original: The ways of our warriors are guided at all times by a sound philosophy of virtue and proper conduct.
translation: 这就是自古以来我们的武士被美德哲学和体面行为所指导的精神

original: The densely populated region of Hindustan provides a wealth of recruits and seasoned soldiers for our armies.
translation: 人口稠密的印度斯坦地区为我们的军队提供了大量的新兵和经验丰富的老兵。

original: Control of the Indus river allows us significant influence over trade in the region.
translation: 掌控印度河让我们拥有了在该区域贸易的强大影响力

original: From the relative destruction caused by volcanic eruption, a surprisingly fertile area has developed.
translation: 火山喷发造成的一系列的破坏形成了一个片令人惊讶的地区。

original: This fertile land is perfect for feeding a standing army.
translation: 这片肥沃的土地是供给常备军的完美之地。

original: Our merchants dominate the African slave trade, ensuring that the profits reach our nation rather than any other.
translation: 我们的商人在非洲的奴隶贸易中占据支配地位，确保了我们国家得到的红利超过了其他任何一个国家。

original: We have not only abolished the brutal slave trade in our own nation, but ensured its abolition in all nations in the vicinity.
translation: 我们不仅要在本国废除残忍的奴隶贸易，还要确保周边各国废除奴隶贸易。

original: The riches of Africa are being exploited to the fullest.
translation: 非洲的财富正被全力地发掘

original: Through skill, luck and ruthless exploitation, we have shepherded our investments until they eclipsed all other contenders.
translation: 通过技艺、幸运以及无情的探索，我们已经掌控了自己的投资直到使其他所有竞争者都黯然失色。

original: We have been blessed with the knowledge that we do God's work.
translation: 我们被从事圣工的认知所佑护

original: Our presence in the far Orient gives us unparalleled influence over global trade.
translation: 我们在远东的存在带给我们在全球贸易无可比拟的影响力

original: With the establishment of our presence in the New World, there are thousands of willing participants in our colonial program.
translation: 随着我们在新大陆立足，成千上万的人自愿加入我们的殖民计划。

original: The tall ships are a sight to behold, transporting tea and other luxury goods at an astounding pace, so as not to let them spoil. Our merchant fleet must be one of the finest in the world!
translation: 这些高桅横帆船令人叹为观止，它们以惊人的速度运送茶叶和其他奢侈品，以免让它们变质。我们的商船队一定是世界上最好的船队之一！

original: While we may not yet be seated on the holy throne, it is clear to all that we possess the regnal air of an Emperor.
translation: 虽然我们还没有坐在神圣的宝座上，但我们都清楚地知道，我们拥有皇帝的帝王气质。

original: In our right hand resides Justice, Truth and Equity.
translation: 在我们的右手中有正义、真理和公平。

original: All lands belonging to our princes have been restored. A glorious day for the Empire!
translation: 所有属于我们君主的土地已经都已经光复。帝国历史上荣耀的一天！

original: We control the spice trade, funnelling wealth into our own ports.
translation: 我们控制了香料贸易，把财富源源不断送进我们自己的港口

original: We have seized a large portion of the silk road.
translation: 我们已经控制了丝绸之路的很大一部分

original: The Bishop of Liege now speaks for us. Or he loses his tongue.
translation: 现在，列日的主教在为我们游说，除非他说不出话。

original: Finally the Kingdom of the Arles has been broken from the grip of the Carolingian successor. Glory to Burgundy!
translation: 阿尔勒王国终于从加洛林王朝的继承者手中独立了。光荣属于勃艮第！

original: Now that we possess the Frisian coast, our merchant fleet can set about making our presence known in the Channel.
translation: 既然我们拥有了弗里西亚海岸，我们的商业船队可以开始将我们的存在昭告整个英吉利海峡了。

original: They say that success breeds further success!
translation: 他们说成功会孕育进一步的成功！

original: We control trade in the Gulf of Aden, home of coffee and incense production.
translation: 我们控制了亚丁湾的贸易，这里是咖啡和香料的国度
被妥善安抚的贝都因人

original: The raiding Bedouins have been subjugated. This is a great relief to our people.
translation: 进犯的贝都因人已被征服。这对我们的人民来说是一个很大的慰藉。
征服土耳其安纳托利亚侯国

original: The Beyliks of Anatolia once again kneel to the Sultan.
translation: 安纳利亚的贝利克斯再次臣服于苏丹。

original: One way or another, our handling of the Hussite rebellion has caused a great resurgence of the utraquist priesthood.
translation: 无论如何，我们在处理胡斯派反叛者的同时不可避免的造成了圣杯派的复苏。

original: Our court is most pleased with the reclamation of our noble lands. Not least because this gives them more opportunity for power...
translation: 我们的宫廷对开垦贵族的土地十分满意。尤其因为是这给了他们更多增强力量的机会…

original: The Black Sheep Turkomans are defeated. The White Sheep rises.
translation: 黑羊土库曼人被击败。白羊崛起。

original: The many tribes of the Caucasus now answer to us. We are learning to integrate them into our nation.
translation: 现在，许多高加索的部落依附我们。我们正在学习将他们融入我们的国家。

original: We have conquered Persia! Now we are truly a great empire in the eyes of all.
translation: 我们征服了波斯！现在我们成为了在所有人眼中的真正的伟大帝国。

original: Baghdad is not the center of religious learning it once was, but under our rule scholars are returning to the city.
translation: 巴格达已经不是以前的宗教研究中心，但在我们的统治之下，越来越多的学者们正在返回这座城市。

original: The looming tide of the Turks demands extra care in preparing fortresses, traps and ambushes.
translation: 突厥人的逐渐逼近迫使我们更加注意地准备堡垒、陷阱和伏击点。

original: We have secured the Balkans against foreign invasion.
translation: 我们已经确保巴尔干会誓死反对外国入侵。

original: A divine wind propels our ships to foreign shores, inviting us to conquest.
translation: 神风将我们的船推向外国海岸，引导我们的征服之路。

original: We have dominated trade in the seas around our home islands.
translation: 我们主导了我们国家岛屿周围海域的贸易。

original: Hokkaido has great potential for the Japanese people, and the native Ainu are no longer an obstacle to our expansion.
translation: 对日本人民来说，现在的北海道具有巨大潜力，而当地的阿伊努人也不再成为我们扩张的障碍。

original: Our conquest of Okinawa cements Japan as a true contender in the South China Sea.
translation: 我们对冲绳的征服牢牢树立了日本在南海的竞争者地位

original: Our astronomers have learned valuable things about our place in the universe. Their findings have made astronomy and astrology much more accessible to the populace!
translation: 我们的天文学家已经学到了关于我们在宇宙中的位置的有价值的东西。他们的发现使天文学和占星术更平易近人!

original: The latest military treatise on warfare from the Oxbridge Symposium was not a fascinating read. It did, however, give our commanders something to discuss at the dinner table.
translation: 牛津大学研讨会最新的军事战争论文不是一篇引人入胜的读物。但是，他却为我们的军官提供了茶余饭后的谈资。

original: This intriguing investigation into European bloodlines only reinforces our claim to the throne of the [Root.GetAdjective] Empire.
translation: 这项对欧洲血统的有趣的调查只是加强了我们对[Root.GetAdjective]帝国王位的宣称。

original: Commoners throughout the country are overjoyed to hear or read of the importance of their place in the Kingdom of God.
translation: 全国的平民听到或读到他们在天国的重要地位时都欣喜若狂。

original: Only those with financial expertise would understand the intricacies of this tome - nonetheless, the effects are making themselves known on our treasury.
translation: 只有那些拥有金融专业知识的人才能理解这本巨著的错综复杂之处——尽管如此，这些影响让我们的财政部知道了这一点。

original: European traders have made it easier than ever to access Indian markets.
translation: 欧洲贸易者比以往任何时候都更容易进入印度市场。

original: Our conquest of Maharashtra allows us to add the expertise of Marathi horsemanship to our own.
translation: 我们对马哈拉施特拉的征服允许我们将马拉塔骑兵的专业知识纳为己用。

original: Following our conquest of Lanka, we should try to convert the local Buddhists to Hinduism.
translation: 随着我们征服了兰卡，我们应该尝试把当地的佛教徒转化为印度教徒。

original: Our dominance of trade in the Gulf of Aden bolsters our merchants throughout the empire.
translation: 我们在亚丁湾的贸易霸权激励了全帝国的商人们。

original: We are exploiting the spice trade along the Malabar Coast to the best of our ability.
translation: 我们正在尽最大努力开发沿马拉巴尔海岸的香料贸易。

original: We are using the spoils of war to invest in the development of our cities.
translation: 我们正在利用战争的战利品来投资发展我们的城市。

original: Our conquest of Andhra was an inspiring victory, bolstering the morale of our armies.
translation: 我们对安得拉的征服是一次鼓舞人心的胜利，鼓舞了我们军队的士气。

original: Our patronage of local deities encourages the loyalty of all Hindus in our lands.
translation: 我们对当地神灵的庇护激发了所有印度教徒对我们的忠诚。

original: Architects in the City of Victory
Our architects are at work on improvements to the capital.
translation: 我们的建筑师正在营造首都

original: Our capital is the center of a great Indian empire, a shining monument to our victories.
translation: 我们的首都是这个伟大印度帝国的中心，让这座闪耀的纪念碑致敬我们的胜利。

original: With trade in East Africa now under our control, the entire Indian Ocean is our oyster!
translation: 随着我们对东非的控制，整个印度洋已经成为了我们的内湖。

original: Our investments into textile manufactories have boosted production throughout the empire.
translation: 我们对纺织业的投资促进了整个帝国的生产力发展。

original: Our conquest of Bengal inspires our armies to feats of great courage.
translation: 我们对孟加拉的征服让我们的军队获得了极大的勇气。

original: The Grand Trunk Road provides expedient travel to our armies, and allows trade to flow freely and efficiently.
translation: 大干道为我们的军队调度提供便利，并使得贸易交流更加自由和有效。

original: With Orissa conquered, we are adapting our armies in preparation for a campaign into the Garjat jungles.
translation: 在征服奥里萨后，我们需要调整我们的军队，以准备迦贾德丛林中的战斗。

original: With Kabul under our control, the Afghan nobles in northern India will think twice before challenging our rule.
translation: 在我们控制喀布尔之后，印度北部的阿富汗贵族会在挑战我们的统治之前三思而后行。

original: The allegiance of the Sindhi Muslims assures adherents throughout our empire that our faith is true.
translation: 由于我们信仰着正统，信德的穆斯林将会是帝国忠实的追随者。

original: The Rajputs have finally been incorporated into our realm, and with them comes their military expertise.
translation: 拉杰普特人最终被纳入我们的统治，我们可以利用他们的军事专长。

original: All of the Deccan is now under our rule. We can now make use of the Arabian horses imported through the western coast.
translation: 德干的全部土地现在都处于我们的治下。 我们现在可以从西海岸进口阿拉伯马。

original: More than any other deity Jagannath is connected to the people of Orissa and more than any other deity this, the greatest avatar of Vishnu, is connected to our dynasty. Each Gajapati king is supported by Jagannath and his priests and the temple at Puri grows richer by the year due to royal patronage.
translation: 主宰神在奥里萨邦人民心中的地位比任何其他神灵都更为高，而我们的王朝，就是毗湿奴在人间的化身。 每任象王都需要得到主宰神与其牧师的支持，而王室的供奉，也使得神殿的势力不断扩大。

original: Our recent conquests have made available many experienced Deccani cavalrymen for service in our armies.
translation: 得益于我们近期的征服行动，许多善战的德干骑兵加入了我们的军队。

original: Our dominance of the Coromandel Coast is bringing in a new era of merchant prosperity to our nation.
translation: 我们在科罗曼德尔海岸的主导地位正在为我们的国家带来商业繁荣的新时代。

original: Our religious centers of learning promote the development of new and more nuanced theological and political ideas.
translation: 我们的宗教学习中心促进了更新更细致的神学和政治思想发展。

original: Our conquest of inland Bengal inspires our armies to greater feats of bravery.
translation: 我们对孟加拉的征服让我们的军队获得了极大的勇气。

original: The partition of Poland demonstrates just how easily we can integrate new provinces into our administration, given the proper impetus.
translation: 对波兰的瓜分表明，只要给予适当的推动力，我们能够轻松地将新省份纳入我们的治下。

original: The loyalty of our Streltsy regiments ensures a stable future for our nation, at least for the time being.
translation: 我们射击军的忠诚确保了我们国家的稳定未来，至少暂时如此。

original: The institution of autocratic rule is curtailing the power of local authorities across the nation, concentrating all authority into the hands of the state, and more specifically the Tsar.
translation: 专制统治制度正在削弱地方当局的权力，从而将所有权力集中在中央政府手中，更具体地说是沙皇。

original: A number of ministerial departments have been established so that the ruling of our nation is as smooth as possible.
translation: 成立若干省部级单位，以使我国的统治更顺畅。

original: We are diverting state resources to ensure that furs from Alaska are safely and efficiently exported to Europe.
translation: 我们在集中国家资源以确保阿拉斯加的毛皮安全有效地出口到欧洲。

original: This city is the Third Rome, most glorious in all the world.
translation: 此城便是第三之罗马，普天同庆吧！

original: The revolutionaries have been crushed! Nothing can stand in the way of the Tsar's authority.
translation: 革命军已被我们的铁骑碾为齑粉！所有妄图抵抗沙皇者，都不过是螳臂当车而已！

original: We have defeated our Muscovite enemies. Our armies are depleted, but reinforcements and experience will make them stronger.
translation: 我们已经击败了来自莫斯科的敌人。虽然战士们付出了惨重的代价，但增援已在路上。

original: Tver is now subject to Novgorod. We are doing all we can to ensure a smooth integration.
translation: 特维尔已经成为了诺夫哥罗德的附庸，我们正竭尽全力以确保顺利整合。

original: The house of Rurik has been either eliminated or subjugated under our rule. Novgorod's Republic is safe.
translation: 我们国内留里克家族的势力已经完全被清除，诺夫哥罗德共和国现在安全了。

original: The dockyard at Neva is capable of producing many ships and sailors for our nation.
translation: 涅瓦造船厂能够为我们国家建造许多船只以及补充水手

original: Novgorod has become the foremost trading city in the world.
translation: 诺夫哥诺德已然成为当今世上最为重要的商业城市

original: The city of Arkhangelsk, on the shore of the White Sea, draws traders from far and wide to buy furs from its market.
translation: 坐落在白海海岸的阿尔汉格尔斯克，以其皮毛贸易吸引着远道而来的商人。

original: The conquest of Finland has brought the issue of buffer-states to the forefront of political discourse.
translation: 对芬兰的征服使得缓冲区问题成为目前政治议论的焦点

original: Novgorod's Archbishop has a significant role in our political affairs. Having established a degree of ecclesiastical independence, he is free to devote his time to the betterment of the state.
translation: 诺夫哥诺德的大主教在日常政治事务中扮演者非常重要的角色，在其建立了一定程度上的教会独立之后，得以将更多的时间投入到对国家的治理之中

original: The grandeur of our Church inspires all who live under our realm to devote themselves to the one true faith.
translation: 我们教会的宏伟激励所有生活在我们领域之下的人们致力于真正的信仰。

original: Control over the port cities of northern Norway allows us to steer trade from the New World for great profit.
translation: 对挪威北部港口城市的控制使我们能够引导新大陆的贸易并从中获得巨额利润。

original: We have seized the heart of the Hanseatic trading network. Wealth flows into our nation.
translation: 我们控制住了汉萨贸易网的核心。财富开始向我国流入。

original: Russia is united under our rule! We restlessly seek to expand our borders even further.
translation: 俄罗斯已经统一在我们的统治之下！我们马不停蹄地寻求向远方扩张我们的边界。

original: The Tatars no longer pose any threat to us. We should now focus our efforts on converting the steppe peoples to the true faith.
translation: 鞑靼人不再对我们构成任何威胁。我们现在应该集中精力使草原人民皈依到正统信仰中来。

original: The Veche Republic has fallen, its merchants forced to trade in our own markets. We are taking advantage of this trade boom.
translation: 卫彻共和国已经衰落，其商人团被迫在我们的市场上交易。我们正在利用这种贸易热潮。

original: Recent military conquests have strengthened the standing of this province as a major local entrepot.
translation: 最近的军事征服加强了该省作为当地主要转口港的地位。

original: The growth of a major entrepot in the eastern Deccan has strengthened our grip on commerce and as a result our economy is booming.
translation: 德干东部主要转口港的增长加强了我们对商业的控制，因此我们的经济正在蓬勃发展。

original: By achieving total control over the rich lands of Southern India we have managed to establish a firm hold over the economy of the Indian Ocean. From East Africa to Malaya the Dakhni language can be heard and products that leave our ports find their way to the great cities of the West as well as the Imperial courts of the East.
translation: 通过实现对印度南部富饶土地的完全控制，我们成功地建立了对印度洋经济的坚定控制。 从东非到马来亚都可以听到达基尼语，离开我们港口的产品可以通往西方的大城市以及东方的皇家宫廷。

original: Through controling all the important ports of the Coromandel Coast we have greatly increased the profitability of all our trading enterprises.
translation: 通过控制科罗曼德尔海岸的所有重要港口，我们大大提高了所有贸易企业的盈利能力。

original: The loss of our ancestral capital has amply demonstrated our inability as rulers. Until we can rebuild the trust that was lost we will have a hard time controlling the lands and people we once relied on to be loyal.
translation: 古老都城的陷落充分证明了我们作为统治者的无能。 在我们重建失去的信任之前，我们将很难控制我们曾经依赖的土地和人民的忠诚度。

original: Through the conquest of the City of Victory we have proven that we are the legitimate rulers of Deccan and surrounding areas.
translation: 通过征服胜利之城，我们证明了我们是德干及周边地区的合法统治者。
比贾普尔 卡纳塔克

original: By subjugating the Karnatak south of Bijapur all the way down to the Commorin Cape we have taken a strong stranglehold both on the westerly trade and on one of the more war hardened parts of the Deccan. New recruits are flocking to our banners both in our local recruitment offices and from overseas.
translation: 通过征服比贾普尔以南的卡纳塔克一直到康沃林海岬，我们在对西方贸易与德干半岛一个饱受战乱的战争地区都取得了强有力的控制。来自本地招募部门和海外地区的新兵如潮水般涌入我们麾下。

original: By securing the trade ports of Gujarat we now have control over much of the Northern Indian Trade, as well as the ports used by most pilgrims for their journey towards Mecca and Medina.
translation: 通过确保古吉拉特邦的贸易港口，我们现在可以控制大部分北印度贸易，以及大多数朝圣者用于前往麦加和麦地那的港口。

original: Direct Contact with the Persian World

By establishing direct control over several important ports along the Arabian Sea we have ensured a direct link with Iran and Arabia. This allows us secure access to war-horses of a quality that we cannot breed in our own climate, as well as the Persian scholars and administrators we need to strengthen our young state.
translation: 通过对阿拉伯海岸几个港口的实际控制，我们确保了与阿拉伯和伊朗的直接联系。这将使我们获得因气候原因无法在我国繁殖的战马，以及我们所需的波斯学者和管理者。

original: The fall of Delhi lead to many treasures stolen and monuments being forcefully torn down. In time new monuments have been constructed in [Root.GetCapitalName], to commemorate this victory for the future.
translation: 德里陷落导致众多财宝被盗，纪念碑被强制摧毁。经过一段时间后，新的纪念碑在[Root.GetCapitalName]建成，以纪念这次胜利，向前看。

original: Securing the Malwa plateau has allowed is a direct access to both northern trade routes for selling our products but also valuable manufacturing centers.
translation: 保障马尔瓦高原的安全，我们可以直接通往北部贸易路线销售产品，还可以直接进入有价值的制造中心。

original: We have proven ourselves to be the guardians of the elite Persianate culture that exists throughout India.
translation: 我们已经证明自己是印度各地精英波斯文化的守护者。

original: By securing access to the sea once more for our sultanate we have ensured that we will not be without the high quality war steeds that is a necessity for an effective cavalry force.
translation: 通过确保我们的苏丹国拥有出海口，我们可以不愁没有精锐骑兵部队所必需的高质量战马。

original: We have built a great Madrasa in this city, to attract learned scholars from the entire persianate world to our lands.
translation: 我们已经在这个城市修建了一座壮丽的伊斯兰学校，以吸引那些来自整个波斯地区的饱学之士到我们的土地上来。

original: We have begun to build an alliance with the local Marathi nobles who are native to these lands. Greatly enhancing our military capabilities.
translation: 我们开始与本地的马拉塔贵族建立联盟。这将大大地增强了我们的军事实力。

original: We have built a capital that will last for generations. A true testament to the state we have built in a foreign land.
translation: 我们已经建立了一个可以持续数代的都市。这是我们在异国他乡建立国家的最好证明。

original: We are employing local Brahmins in our administration instead of reserving such positions for the Ulema.
translation: 我们在管理中雇佣当地的婆罗门，而不是为乌理玛保留这些职位。

original: We have carved our way through northern India all the way to the Arabian Sea. We are establishing trade connections so that this conquest benefits our economy.
translation: 我们已经开辟了穿过印度北部一直到阿拉伯海的道路。 我们正在建立贸易联系，以便使得这种征服有利于我们的经济。

original: The Chinese Emperor holds no sway over our Empire. The Dragon's humiliation is our claim to absolute sovereignty.
translation: 中华天子没有动摇我们帝国的统治。我们对完全主权的要求是龙的耻辱。

original: We are reaping the benefits of religious unity in the Bengal Delta. Now that the majority follow the state religion, we can strive to be a truly pious society.
translation: 我们正从孟加拉三角洲的信仰统一中获得收益。既然大多数人都信奉国教，我们就可以努力去建设一个真正虔诚的社会。

original: Many of our settlements are now producing an abundance of coinage bearing the image of our enlightened ruler. By regulating production, we can fill our coffers without reducing the value of this coinage.
translation: 在统治者的开明统治下，我们的许多定居点现在都在产生大量的钱币。通过调节生产，我们可以在不降低货币价值的情况下充实国库。

original: Bengal's textile industry is now among the most productive and innovative in the world.
translation: 孟加拉的纺织业是当今世界最具生产力和创新性的产业之一。

original: Charismatic Sufi mystics are settling the frontier regions of the Bengal Delta. We should capitalize on their presence by patronizing shrines and establishing rice markets.
translation: 有感召力的苏菲神秘主义者正在孟加拉三角洲的边境地区定居。 我们应该通过赞助神社和建立大米市场来充分利用他们的存在。

original: Bengal's shipyards are truly impressive. The sheer scale, manpower, and engineering knowledge required for this project leaves the world in awe.
translation: 孟加拉的造船厂着实令人印象深刻。其产业规模、投入的人力和所需的工程知识让世界为之惊叹。

original: The Garjats have accepted their traditional place as subjects to coastal rulers.
translation: 迦贾德人已经接受了他们传统的作为沿海统治者臣民的地位。

original: Our conquest of Orissa leaves our generals anxious to continue our campaigns to even greater glory.
translation: 我们对奥里萨的征服行动使得我们的将领们极度渴望持续征战以追求更高的荣誉。

original: We are extending our administrative reach over Burma, doing away with local traditions of decentralized rule.
translation: 我们正在扩大我们对缅甸的行政管理范围，废除当地的分治传统。

original:
Tyger Tyger, burning bright,

In the forests of the night;

What immortal hand or eye,

Could frame thy fearful symmetry?
translation:
老虎！老虎！黑夜的森林中，

燃烧着的煌煌的火光；

是怎样的神手或天眼，

造出了你这样的威武堂堂？

original: We have commandeered Gujarati shipbuilders so that we can build own own trading fleets.
translation: 我们征用了古吉拉特造船厂，以便建立我们自己的贸易船队。

original: The richest lands in India now belong to us. Delhi itself, the seat of conquerors, has joined our empire.
translation: 印度最富庶的土地以为我们所有。德里，征服者的宝座，已加入我们的帝国。

original: Our integration of vassal states encourages greater centralization throughout Malwa.
translation: 我们对附庸国的整合极大地加强了整个摩腊婆的中央集权。

original: Our soldiers feasted well when we conquered the Baghels. They will march with a full stomach toward our next target.
translation: 我们的士兵在征服巴格尔人时享用了一顿大餐。他们将饱饱地向下一个目标前进。

original: Hindus and Muslims need not be enemies, as we have demonstrated through the intermarriage of our royal lines.
translation: 印度教徒与穆斯林不必成为宿敌，正如我们在皇室的跨信仰联姻中所证明的那样。

original: Together with strong allies, we will conquer vast swathes of land.
translation: 有了强力的盟友，我们将征服大片土地。

original: Having restored the fortification of Mandu, we can look beyond the capital to the improvement of defenses throughout the realm.
translation: 在重建了曼杜后，我们我们应将目光放到首都以外要塞的升级加固上。

original: All courtiers, both men and women, must have an education.
translation: 所有朝臣，无论男女，都必须接受教育。

original: Our naval dominance allows us to control all trade in western India.
translation: 我们的海军优势使我们能够控制西印度的所有贸易。

original: We have subjugated all of Saurashtra, significantly extending our domain and adding a good recruitment ground for our future armies to our state.
translation: 我们已经征服了整个索拉什特拉地区，这显著扩展了我们的疆域，为我们未来的军队增添了良好的招募基地。

original: The addition of the Malwa plateau, with its rich volcanic soils have ensured a much greater and more reliable supply of cotton and other cash crops for the industries of Gujarat.
translation: 马尔瓦高原有着富饶的火山土壤，它的加入能够确保为古吉拉特的工业源源不断地提供棉花等经济作物。

original: Our governor in Rajputana overseas all our possessions in the region and works for the long term integration of the region into our state.
translation: 我们的海外殖民地拉杰普塔纳的总督拥有我们在这个区域的所有财产，并且致力于让这个区域融入我们国家。

original: The fall of Mewar has strengthened our grip over the region and proven to many that our presence here is going to be permanent.
translation: 梅瓦尔的陷落强化了我们对该区域的控制，给许多人证明了我们将会在这里永久存在。

original: The Paper Mills of Ahmadabad have under our supervision quickly grown to become the most productive in all of India, greatly contributing to the growth of the city.
translation: 艾哈迈达巴德的造纸厂在我们的监督下迅速发展成为印度全国最具生产力的工厂，为城市的发展做出了巨大的贡献。

original: Gujarati Textiles have become famous throughout the world for their quality and the demand has only grown bigger over time. For people from Europe to China the name Cambay is synonymous with expensive Fabrics.
translation: 古吉拉特纺织品因其质量而举世闻名，随着时间的推移，需求量也越来越大。对于从欧洲到中国的人来说，坎贝这个名字就是昂贵面料的代名词。

original: By establishing control over the cape we have gained a valuable port of call on the route further west as well as a base for controlling the western trade with the Indian Ocean.
translation: 通过控制海角，我们在向西的路线上获得了一个宝贵的停泊港，以及控制西方与印度洋贸易的基地。

original: We have established a permanent port in Southern Africa for the furthering of our interests in relation to the western trade.
translation: 我们已在南非建立了一个永久港口，以进一步维护与西方贸易关系中我方的利益。

original: Through our concentrated efforts we have managed to elevate Gujarati shipyards to be the envy of the world.
translation: 通过我们的不懈努力，我们成功地使得古吉拉特造船厂成为举世瞩目的象征。

original: Surat has grown to be the biggest trade port in India and, according to some, the entire world. Goods from the Americas, Europe, Africa and all of Asia are regularly consumed or resold. If in any land it can be said that gold and silver flow it is here.
translation: 苏拉特已成长为印度，有些人甚至说是世界上最大的贸易港口。来自美洲、欧洲、非洲和整个亚洲的货物都被日常消费或者转售。在任何地方都能被认为是流动着黄金白银之地。

original: We have renovated the ancient and holy city of Ujjain to be the new capital of all Rajput princes. A strong message to any of the invaders who would call this subcontinent their home.
translation: 我们已经修缮了古老的圣城邬阇衍那，使它成为所有拉杰普特王公们的新首都。向这个次大陆的所有入侵者传递这是他们的家乡这一强烈信息。

original: Rajputs have always been famous horsemen but it is through dedicated effort that we have managed to create a native war horse breed stronger than all other in the subcontinent.
translation: 拉杰普特人一直以骑兵著称，但是通过我们的不懈努力，我们已经培育出了一种比次大陆其他地方更优秀的本土战马。

original: Through concerted effort we have managed to turn the mercenary Purbias that abound in Northern India into a strong military force under our command.
translation: 通过齐心协力，我们已经设法将北印度的普尔比亚雇佣兵转化为我们麾下一股强大的军事力量。

original: The martial traditions of our ancestors and our work to create a modern military force have together resulted in a peak of military efficiency in our armies.
translation: 我们祖先的尚武传统以及我们创立现代化军队的努力一起作用，使得我们军队的军事效率达到了巅峰。

original: Our sudden expansion in Northern India has empowered the Rajput Trade guilds, who are now an integral part in the flow of goods and capital.
translation: 我们在印度北部的迅速扩张使我们授予拉杰普特商人行会更多的权力，他们现在是商品与资本流动中不可分割的一部分。

original: We have freed the imperial city of Kannauj and rebuilt it in all its glory as the capital of a Northern India united under a Rajput state.
translation: 我们已经解放了帝国城市——卡瑙杰城。作为一个印度北部的首都，在拉杰普特国家的统治下，我们重建了其所有的荣耀。

original: We have reconquered Malwa and made it the domain of our house. Clearly this marks us as a leader to follow for all Rajputs!
translation: 我们重新征服了马尔瓦并使其成为我们家族的领地。显然，这标志着我们成为所有拉杰普特人的领导者！

original: We have united Rajputana and all the great Rajput families are now our retainers.
translation: 我们统一了拉杰普塔纳，现在所有伟大的拉杰普特家族都是我们的家臣。

original: The conquest of Gondwana has opened up for the recruitment of soldiers experienced in jungle warfare and guerrilla tactics.
translation: 对冈瓦纳的征服为招募熟练丛林战、游击战的士兵开辟了一条道路。

original: The conquest of Magadha has strengthened our state economically as well as politically. We have positioned ourselves as the protectors of traditional values and the restorers of imperial ambitions long lost.
translation: 征服摩揭陀已经在经济和政治上巩固了我们的国家。我们把自己定位为传统价值观的保护者，与长久以来失落的帝国雄心的重建者。

original: Our efforts to fortify the hills of Rajputana have born fruit in the form of a series of formidable defensive installations that will halt any invader. These forts are also almost as effective as control points for our own state, and some would even argue that is why they were built...
translation: 我们巩固拉杰普塔纳山地地区防御的努力已开花结果：一系列的难以攻克的防御设施将阻止任何入侵者。这些堡垒几乎和我们自己境内的据点一样有效，一些人认为这就是它们被建造的原因。

original: Udaipur is the new and stately capital that our dynasty has built for itself, surrounded by lakes in the old heartland of our kingdom. It will stand strong as long as our state remains independent.
translation: 乌代布尔是我们王朝为自己建造的新的庄严的首都, 它被我们王国古老的中心地带的湖泊所包围。只要我们的国家保持独立, 它就会强大起来。

original: The conquest of Punjab has added the Upper Indus to our realm. Unlike our homeland, Punjab may be hot but it is still fertile. The Punjabi fields will feed our armies just as well as the Bhils, Jats and of course Rajputs, will fill out our ranks.
translation: 对旁遮普的征服使得印度河上游被纳入了我国的版图。与我们的家乡不同，旁遮普气候炎热但水土肥沃。旁遮普的田地正如比尔人、贾特人甚至拉杰普特人那样供养我们的军队，充实我们的队伍。

original: Our near-monopolies on diamonds, spices, and textiles bring great wealth to our nation.
translation: 在几乎垄断钻石，香料和纺织品后，为我们国家带来了巨大的财富。

original: Our monumental investment into Bengali industry puts us at the forefront of technological innovation.
translation: 我们对孟加拉工作里程碑式的投资，使我们站在了技术创新的前沿。

original: We are one people, a truly harmonious nation.
translation: 我们同属一个民族，一个真正和谐的国家。

original: With Bengal united, we can focus our efforts into clearing away the dense jungles, making way for agricultural cultivation.
translation: 孟加拉统一后，我们可以集中精力清除密集的丛林，为发展农业种植开辟道路。

original: The Rajput nobility must be content to integrate into our nation without special favor.
translation: 拉杰普特贵族必须同意无条件的融入我们的国家。

original: Our monarch sits atop the majestic Peacock Throne, adorned with rubies, garnets, diamonds, pearls, and emeralds.
translation: 我们的君主坐在雄伟壮丽的孔雀王座之顶，它以红宝石、石榴石、钻石、珍珠和翡翠作为装饰。

original: The holy river Ganges brings spiritual purity to our realm.
translation: 圣河恒河为我们的王国带来了精神纯洁。

original: We may not quite have seized one million elephants during our conquest of the Lao, but propagating such statistics makes recruitment easier.
translation: 我们征服老挝期间并未真的抓获了一百万头大象，但宣传这一数字会令征兵工作更为轻松。

original: With a plentiful supply of rice from the newly conquered land of Lan Na, our armies march with a full stomach.
translation: 随着新征服的兰纳土地上丰富的大米供应，我们的军队得以饱餐后行军。

original: Our monarch has claimed the name Chakravarti, meaning Universal Ruler. All the peoples of South-East Asia recognize our rule.
translation: 我们的君主已经宣称自己为转轮圣王，也就是普世统治者。所有东南亚的人民都将听从我们的统治。

original: The conquest of Arakan, including the trading city of Chittagong, provides new opportunities to steer trade to our shores.
translation: 对阿拉干的征服，囊括了贸易城市吉大港，这给我们提供了机会将贸易引导到我们的海岸。

original: The wars against Siam were hard-fought. Elephant clashed with elephant in battles that will be recounted until the end of time. Much has been learned from the ordeal.
translation: 对抗暹罗的战争非常艰难。战斗从始至终都是战象之间的决斗。这场战役让我们学到了很多东西。

original: With Bengal under our grasp, the need to expand our administration is clear. We cannot rely on loose systems of vassalage to control our domain.
translation: 随着孟加拉落入我们掌控，扩大行政管理部门的需求是显而易见的。我们不能依靠松散的附庸体系来控制我们的领土。

original: We have defended the shrines and relics of Lanka, and in doing so we have renewed our own sacred Buddhist traditions.
translation: 我们捍卫了兰卡的神龛和遗迹，从而复兴了我们自己神圣的佛教传统。

original: The monarch is the center of the universe. All other rulers orbit him in worship.
translation: 君主是世界的中心，所有其余的统治者都须心怀崇敬的环绕在他身旁。

original: Troublesome populations should be resettled in the capital to reduce the risk of armed revolts.
translation: 会引起麻烦的人群应该被重新安置在首都来减少武装叛乱的风险。

original: The Kanbawzathadi Palace has been erected to declare the glory of our new capital.
translation: 勃固王宫已经建造完毕，以宣告我们新首都的荣耀。

original: A great number of adventurers of various backgrounds have joined our ranks to loot the riches of the Indian subcontinent.
translation: 许多不同背景的冒险家加入了我们的行列去掠夺印度次大陆的财富。

original: The advance into India has amply rewarded our followers and they now fight with renewed vigour to extend our control over this land.
translation: 进入印度充分奖励了我们的追随者。现在他们有新的动力进行战斗，以便扩大我们对这块土地的控制。

original: This is the capital of Lahore Subah, one of the administrative provinces of our Empire and the natural capital of Punjab.
translation: 这是拉合尔“苏巴”的省府，是我们帝国治下的省份之一，也是旁遮普的传统首都。

original: We have gone to great lengths to build a strong and well garrisoned fort in this province, to hold back foreign invaders and to control the local clans of these mountains.
translation: 我们已经尽我们所能在这个省建立了一个强力而坚固的堡垒，对抗外来的侵略者，并控制这些山区的当地部落。

original: We have reforged the empire that was lost upon the death of Amir Timur and realized the ambitions of Shah Rukh and Abu Said.
translation: 自埃米尔 帖木儿去世以后这个帝国便陷入了衰弱，如今我们已经重建了这个帝国并实现了沙哈鲁和阿布 赛义德的野心。

original: Our conquest of Upper Burma has secured the greatest source of rubies known to man for our empire.
translation: 我们对上缅甸的征服为我们帝国提供了源源不断的红宝石的供应，这种宝石被我们人民所熟知。

original: Through force of arms we have forced the Chinese to do trade and diplomacy with us on our own terms.
translation: 我们通过武力迫使中国人按照我们自己的条件与我们进行贸易和外交。

original: Through a great land assessment we have acquired an overview sufficient to fully administrate the lands under our control in an efficient manner.
translation: 通过大规模的土地评估，我们获得了足够的信息，以便全面而有效地管理我们所控制的土地。

original: Our conquest of the Malay Peninsula has given us access to the able sailors of the archipelago.
translation: 我们对马来半岛的征服给予了我们任用有能力的水手的机会。

original: This is the capital of our South East Asian Subah, and in many ways it is therefore the capital of the entire region.
translation: 这是我们东南亚“苏巴”的省府，从很多方面而言，它也是整个地区的首府。
